get_line.en: I want to save the world with the mercy of healing.

story.en: Second daughter of Rosvalt, an adviser to the former king of Ezera, Achates joined the Holy Order of the Blue Cross with the wish to save the world through the Goddess's mercy. She has little to do with her older sister, heir to the family name, and seems to be holding some discontent within her heart.

description.en: A faithful healer following a sacred oath
Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns.
Recovers an ally's Health and grants a barrier for 1 turn, before decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn. Amount recovered and barrier strength increase proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Recovers an ally's Health and grants invincibility for 1 turn, before decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

description.en: Dispels debuffs from all allies before healing them. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Dream big! Then you won't feel sorry even if you can't make it, right?

story.en: A young boy with wild dreams of becoming a legendary hero, or meeting the Heir of the Covenant, in reality Adlay is a rather plain and timid student. He wants to stand out but very ordinary.

description.en: A daydreaming student dreaming of becoming a legendary hero
Attacks with the power of a magical tome, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.
Combat Readiness increases by {{variable}} every time an ally except for the caster is attacked.

enhanced_description.en: Combat Readiness increases by {{variable}} every time an ally except for the caster is attacked, and the caster's skill cooldown is reset when an ally dies.

description.en: Deals huge damage to all enemies with a sealing spell, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff, before a {{variable}} chance to increase skill cooldowns by 1 turn.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c5001_gacha_get)

story.en: Faced with an otherworldly threat, Ras renounced his holiness and became Human in order to save Orbis. Now that he understands the true nature of power, he is able to fully utilize those granted to him by Diche and Ilryos as he looks ahead to new adventures.

description.en: A living legend of Orbis who renounced his holiness
Attacks with a sword, dealing damage proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with a sword, with 75% chance to dispel a buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

description.en: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, before triggering a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Strongly attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, before recovering the caster's Health and increasing Defense of all allies for 2 turns. Amount recovered and damage dealt increase proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: My name is Ainos, and I'm an Automatic Doll here to support you.

story.en: An Automatic Doll that is honest at best and arrogant and aggressive at worst. Some people think her language unit and anger control circuit are malfunctioning.

description.en: A cynical Automatic Doll from the stars
Silently shoots the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 1 turn.
At the end of the turn, increases Combat Readiness of the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack by {{variable}}.

enhanced_description.en: At the end of the turn, increases Combat Readiness of the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack by {{variable}} and dispels one debuff from an ally.

description.en: Throws a firepower cube to attack all enemies, before healing all allies and granting increased Attack and Speed for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

get_line.en: Let's try doing things my way.

story.en: A fighter known among the criminal underground as the Aakhen Outlaw, Ains has committed a lot of crimes with his simple and bravado-driven personality. He once had a strong reputation for taking care of the people around him, but after escaping prison he became incredibly selfish.

description.en: A reckless backstreet brawler

Punches the enemy, with a 50% chance to use Satisfying Strike instead of Gazelle Punch.
Satisfying Strike: Attacks the enemy. A successful attack always results in a critical hit.
When attacked, has a {{variable}} chance to counterattack.
Punches the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Punches the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Wow! Me? You're greeting me? Really? Wah! Ahaha! I'm so excited!

story.en: Aither is the royal child of Ezera. He is bright and energetic, but he does not like those people who treat him as a weak boy. He desires to make his name as a brave knight one day, just like his mother.

description.en: The Kingdom's lovable, enthusiastic prince!
Attacks with spirit power, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.

Recovers an ally's Health with water energy while dispelling two debuffs, before increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 20%. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health and the caster's Attack.

Recovers Health of all allies and casts a barrier for 1 turn with spirit power. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health, and barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Attack.

enhanced_description.en: Recovers Health of all allies and casts a barrier for 2 turns with spirit power. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health, and barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Attack.

get_line.en: You'd better have a good reason for wasting my time.

story.en: Maternal aunt of Luna and Yufine, who believes that Dragons are the wisest and most graceful beings in the world. As she considers it inelegant to have frequent mood swings like lowly creatures do, she tends to be kind to others unless they cross a line.

description.en: A pureblood who sees Humans as inferior
Batters the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Increases effect chance to 100% and decreases Defense of the target for 2 turns.

description.en:
{{variable}} chance to grant Mind's Eye to the caster for 1 turn when attacked. On the caster's turn, when using Eradicate while granted Mind's Eye, activates Trample.
Trample: Strikes the enemy, decreasing the cooldown of Genesis by 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Attacks all enemies with Dragon's might, dispelling all buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with Dragon's Might, dispelling all buffs and granting increased Defense to all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Before the Goddess, I vow to do my best.

story.en: Despite her young age, Alexa has managed to become a formally appointed knight of the Order of the Sword trusted with all kinds of duties. She greatly admires Iseria, who taught her how to use a sword.

description.en: A faithful and honest member of the Order of the Sword

Cuts the enemy with dual-wielded swords. A critical hit will have a 50% chance of activating Lightning Bolt. Lightning Bolt can only be activated once per turn of the caster.
Lightning Bolt (Acquire 1 Soul): Rapidly cuts the enemy with dual-wielded swords.

enhanced_description.en:
Cuts the enemy with dual-wielded swords. A critical hit will activate Lightning Bolt. Lightning Bolt can only be activated once per turn of the caster.
Lightning Bolt (Acquire 1 Soul): Rapidly cuts the enemy with dual-wielded swords.

description.en: Attacks with a cold blade with a {{variable}} chance to inflict two poison effects for 2 turns, and increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 30%.
Attacks the enemy continuously, dealing damage proportional to number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c4065_gacha_get)

story.en: Wanda has come to realize that her inability to concentrate on only one thing also makes her extremely capable of handling many things at once. With the knowledge and skills she has acquired so far, she decides to advertise herself as a mercenary capable of taking requests of any kind.

description.en: An all-rounder with a wealth of experience
Shoots an arrow at the enemy. When the enemy is targeted, damage dealt is increased and their Combat Readiness is decreased by {{variable}}.
Has a {{variable}} chance to target a random enemy for 2 turns at the beginning of each turn.
Attacks the enemy by exploding a flare, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn, and a {{variable}} chance to make them unhealable for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy by exploding a flare, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 2 turns, and a {{variable}} chance to make them unhealable for 2 turns.

get_line.en: I'm Tywin Herad, Captain of the Royal Guard of Lefundos. This better be worth my time...

story.en: Arrogant and cruel, he sees others only as pawns to be used for his own ends. He's so skilled at managing his reputation that he's known as a reliable and loyal knight despite his true nature.

description.en: Captain of the Royal Guard of Lefundos who seeks only to rise in station
Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to  provoke for 1 turn. Removes 4 Souls from the opponent. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Has a {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff from all allies when an ally is debuffed after the caster is attacked. Can only activate once per turn.
Attacks all enemies with an instant swordstorm, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with an instant swordstorm, with a {{variable}} chance each to stun for 1 turn and decrease Speed for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c4042_gacha_get)

story.en: Even after being formally appointed a nun, Montmorancy keeps making mistakes. However, instead of blaming herself and asking others for help, she perseveres in her efforts to help others.

description.en: A hardworking nun doing her best to help weak and poor souls
Attacks the enemy with water energy, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn.
Dispels one debuff from all allies, and heals debuffed allies. Amount recovered is proportional to the ally's max Health.
Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns, dispelling two debuffs. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns, dispelling two debuffs, before increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Effect is granted to all allies.

get_line.en: Hmm... Since it's been a while, take good care of me!

story.en: High Priestess of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, Angelica is a healer of incredible divine power. Despite her youthful appearance, she is the most senior member of the Conclave.

description.en: The carefree High Priestess of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross
Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.
Recovers ally's Health with healing power. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Recovers ally's Health, as well as that of another ally with the least Health, with healing power. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's max Health.

description.en: Recovers the Health of all allies and grants a barrier and immunity for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength are proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 2 turns.

get_line.en: I have descended to fulfill the prophecy with my own hands.

story.en: Originally born in a small village, she was chosen to become an incarnation of the god of war, before accidentally falling into another dimension while fighting an enemy general. She has no memories of her life before she was deified.

description.en: A girl born amidst calamity, revered as the god of war
Attacks the enemy with an axe, absorbing some of the damage dealt as Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Greatly increases damage dealt. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.

description.en: At the moment the caster is attacked, consumes 10 Fighting Spirit to recover the caster's Health. Starts the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Increases Critical Hit Chance by 30%.

Delivers divine judgment down upon the enemy. When the enemy is defeated, revives one random dead ally with 5% Health and grants skill nullifier once. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Delivers divine judgment down upon the enemy. When the enemy is defeated, revives one random dead ally with 10% Health and increases their Combat Readiness by 100% before granting skill nullifier once. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Pleased to meet you, let's work together.

story.en: Aramintha is a gentle and cheerful woman, and leader of the Phantom CIC, a group dedicated to investigating the Unknown to whom she lost her husband. She is an incredible fighter, but often gets caught up bragging about her husband when she's not in a battle.

description.en: Leader of the Phantom CIC, Unknown investigators
Attacks the enemy with an explosion of flames, with a {{variable}} chance to burn for 2 turns. Ignores Effect Resistance.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy with an explosion of flames, with a {{variable}} chance to burn for 2 turns. Decreases cooldown of Fire Pillar by 1 turn. Ignores Effect Resistance.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with a catalytic explosion, making them unhealable for 2 turns before increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies with a massive fire pillar, with a {{variable}} chance to burn for 2 turns and a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

get_line.en: Do you think you can handle the power I possess?

story.en: Once among the greatest of believers in the Goddess and her Covenant, Arbiter Vildred joined hands with the Acolyte Kayron and betrayed everyone and everything he once believed in. Within his body is contained the power of the Archdemon Anghraf.

description.en: A knight who has embraced the boundless power of darkness
Rapidly attacks two enemies with a swordstorm, with a 50% chance to decrease their Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.

enhanced_description.en: Rapidly attacks two enemies with a swordstorm, decreasing their Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.

description.en: Upon receiving lethal damage, regenerates to {{variable}} Health, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 100%, fully recovers the caster's Focus, and resets skill cooldown of Dark Blade.
Attacks all enemies, decreasing Hit Chance for 2 turns. When Focus is full, consumes it all, increasing damage dealt. When the enemy is defeated with this skill, cooldown does not occur.

get_line.en: Come to me. Closer... A little closer... Until your darkness intertwines with my emptiness to form one pitch blackness.

story.en: The manifestation of chaos that's mixed with the power and souls of many beings. Though it takes the shape of a girl who was once a part of it, its essence is not of life but rather pieces of memories and corrupt energy. As it longs endlessly for new bodies, it now wanders to find a being that can contain it.

description.en: The manifestation of a corrupt emotion that permeates one's most vulnerable parts
Has a {{variable}} chance to seal the enemy for 2 turns, before attacking with lightning.

Decreases damage suffered from a critical hit by {{variable}}. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. After using Touch of Chaos, has a 35% chance to activate Burst. Effect chance is doubled when the target is sealed.
Burst: Attacks all enemies, with a 60% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 25% and gaining 1 Focus.
Attacks all enemies with the power of Ilryos, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with the power of Ilryos, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

get_line.en: Oh, did you need something? Just let me know!

story.en: A particularly ticklish feline Suin, Armin is the valiant and cheerful Commander of the Longtail Company. However, she is easily tempted, and quickly convinced to go along with the whims of her fellow mercenaries. She loves to collect earrings but since her ears are so sensitive she's unable to actually wear them.

description.en: Unmatched in her bravery, commander of the Longtail Company
Attacks with a large shield, with a {{variable}} chance of stunning for 1 turn. When the enemy is debuffed, the chance will increase. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Releases a bright light to attack all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Releases a bright light to attack all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns, and inflict poison for 3 turns. Increases Defense of the caster for 2 turns.

description.en: Covers all allies with the Shield of Light and grants a barrier for 3 turns before recovering Health. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Defense, and amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health. Decreases damage suffered by allies by 10% when this skill is unavailable. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: Were you looking for me?

story.en: Doris Rutton's personal bodyguard, Arowell often comes off as stiff due to her serious personality. She is willing to follow Doris anywhere, and will protect her at any cost.

description.en: A bodyguard who will protect her lady at any cost
Attacks with a sword and shield, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel two buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Grants a barrier to the ally with the lowest Health for 2 turns at the start of battle and at the start of the caster's turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Attacks the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn and decreases Combat Readiness by 30%. Combat Readiness reduction effect ignores Effect Resistance. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Meeting new people is one way to have fun.

story.en: A member of the Sicar assassin organization, Cartuja is an optimistic thrill seeker who finds great joy in observing the world.

description.en: A judge presiding over a world full of thrills
Attacks with sharp claws, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict bleeding for 2 turns.
Increases Evasion Chance of all allies by 15%. When the caster's turn ends, successfully evades the next attack once. Combat Readiness increases by {{variable}} each time evading the enemy's attack.
Dashes towards the enemy to attack, stunning for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Dashes towards the enemy to attack, stunning for 1 turn. Decreases Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Are we assassinating someone today too? Who's our target?

story.en: A boy who spent his days looking for a place where he belonged, until Eligos took him in.

description.en: Eligos's faithful dog with a sad past
Attacks with an axe, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
When somebody dies, caster is granted increased Attack for 1 turn and Combat Readiness increases by {{variable}}.

Attacks the enemy with a powerful ground pound, silencing them for 1 turn and decreasing their Combat Readiness by 50%, before increasing Evasion Chance of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. Removes 20 Souls from the opponent.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy with a powerful ground pound, silencing them for 1 turn and decreasing their Combat Readiness by 50%, before increasing Evasion Chance of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster and enemy's Speed. Removes 20 Souls from the opponent.

get_line.en: I am the assassin Nicolette Fleure.

story.en: A silent assassin in the shadows, it is said that anyone who sees the glint of Assassin Coli's blade in the moonlight will not live much longer.

description.en: An agile assassin hiding in the silence
Ambushes the enemy. When the caster is stealthed, increases damage dealt and increases Speed of the caster for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
When the caster is free of debuffs, has a {{variable}} chance each to be granted increase Attack for 1 turn at the beginning of turn, and stealth for 1 turn at the end of the turn.
Moves silently to attack the enemy, silencing all enemies for 1 turn when the enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

enhanced_description.en: Moves silently to attack the enemy, stunning for 1 turn. Silences all enemies for 1 turn when the target is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

get_line.en: I'm a different Lots altogether, shall we see who deserves to be called the true Lots?

story.en: A magical doll modeled on Lots. Compared to the original Lots, this doll is extremely competitive and desperate for recognition, and so participates in as many activities around Reingar as possible.

description.en: The first magical doll to be created in Reingar
Attacks with a magic sphere, increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 15%.
Injects an ally except for the caster with Mana, increasing Attack for 2 turns and Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.

enhanced_description.en: Injects an ally with mana, increasing Attack for 2 turns and increasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, before granting the caster increased Attack for 2 turns and a 30% increase in Combat Readiness.

description.en: Attacks all enemies by releasing strong Mana, with a {{variable}} chance to silence for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Order! I am an officer of the Reingar Public Security Club, Azalea Pormia!

story.en: An officer of the Reingar Public Security Club, Azalea is mainly responsible for guarding the library and catching book thieves. Despite being trusted with many leadership duties, she has a history of continuously failing to be appointed to the Student Council.

description.en: A faithful officer with a duty to maintain order
Stabs the enemy with a spear and recovers Health of the caster. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Attacks the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance each of provoking and making them unhealable for 2 turns.

description.en: Sweeps all enemies with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Speed and Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: If Sezan wishes it, we will go.

story.en: Sezan was once a dark magician, until her body was destroyed in a forbidden summoning ceremony gone awry. Before her soul also perished, her apprentice Baal placed it inside a doll, and together they have embarked on a long journey to return her soul to a Human body.

description.en: A great magician-turned-doll, and her faithful apprentice
Summons an evil spirit to attack two enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict poison for 2 turns.

Summons the Cloud of Darkness to attack all enemies, dealing damage proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy. When the enemy is defeated by this attack, the cooldown for Last Requiem is reset.
Baal & Sezan attack all enemies with Strike Magic, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them unhealable and inflict decreased Speed for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Baal & Sezan attack all enemies with Strike Magic, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them unhealable and inflict decreased Defense and Speed for 2 turns.

get_line.en: I don't strive to achieve a greater good. It's a dog-eat-dog world, I kill anyone, no matter if they're good or evil.

story.en: She lost her family and friends in a Gear attack led by That Man. From that point on she walked the path of Asura, obsessed with exacting revenge on That Man. Tough and decisive, she boasts fighting power that can rival even that of a Gear.

description.en: A one-armed, one-eyed samurai dreaming of revenge
Attacks the enemy repeatedly, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two bleeding effects for 2 turns. A critical hit will reduce the caster's skill cooldowns by 1 turn.
Attacks the enemy with expert swordsmanship, with a {{variable}} chance each of inflicting three bleeding effects for 2 turns. One bleeding effect ignores Effect Resistance.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy with expert swordsmanship, with a {{variable}} chance each of inflicting three bleeding effects for 2 turns. One bleeding effect ignores Effect Resistance. A critical hit will grant an extra turn.

description.en: Delivers a deadly blow, detonating any bleeding effects inflicted on the enemy at the end of the turn. A critical hit increases the Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}}.

get_line.en: I wondered when you'd call.

story.en: Leader of one of the six biggest merchant guilds in Savara, Basar is a seller of poisons and explosives. A genius of business, at a young age he has gained enough power to compare with the great Afih Merchant Guild.

description.en: A genius holding sway over the economy of an entire continent
Attacks with wind magic. When the caster is debuffed, has a {{variable}} chance to transfer one debuff from the caster to the enemy and inflict a random debuff for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies by releasing a hot sand hurricane, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Hit Chance and Attack for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies with sand magic, dispelling all buffs and decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with sand magic, dispelling all buffs and making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns, before decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%.

get_line.en: My name is Bask Royceman, an escort of the Order of the Sword. I look forward to working with you.

story.en: With no particular religious faith, and wishing solely to become stronger, he joined the Order of the Sword. His only goal is to have his name remembered by future generations as a powerful knight and he cannot understand anyone who dies in the service of faith or personal beliefs.

description.en: An impious knight of the Order of the Sword
Slashes with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Attacks with a shield, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel all buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Covers all allies with the Will of Protection, granting immunity for 3 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Covers all allies with the Will of Protection, granting immunity for 3 turns, before granting a barrier to the caster for 3 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: A world in which only the strong survive...? I like that.

story.en: Batisse gained incredible power after using his teacher, Hataan, and other companions to obtain the Fighter's Mask. Intoxicated by that power, he murdered them all except for Hataan and disappeared. As time passed, the power the mask gave him grew stronger, but in return, his sense of self is becoming increasingly blurred.

description.en: A tragic fighter craving power

Hits the enemy in the face. When used against an enemy inflicted with decreased Attack, activates Rock Smash as an extra attack.
Rock Smash: Attacks all enemies. This attack receives effects that are applied to the basic skill.

soul_description.en: Activates Rock Smash even when used against enemy without decreased Attack.

description.en: At the start of the turn, has a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack of the enemy with the highest Combat Readiness for 2 turns.
Attacks the enemy with blindingly fast speed. When used against an enemy inflicted with decreased Attack, decreases Defense for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy with blindingly fast speed. When used against an enemy inflicted with decreased Attack, decreases Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Pleased to meet you.

story.en: Daughter of a noble Ezeran family, Bellona ran away from home, refusing to be forced into an arranged marriage. After joining the Phantom CIC she appears to be much more satisfied with her new life, where she can fight as many strong enemies as she likes and hone her skills.

description.en: A noble lady of Ezera yearning for freedom
Attacks the enemy with a fan, dealing damage proportional to the enemy's max Health. When the caster's stacked Focus is 5 or more, consumes all Focus and activates Razorwind Fan.
Attacks all enemies by waving a fan. Damage dealt increases with more enemies.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies by waving a fan. Damage dealt increases with more enemies. Grants the caster immunity for 1 turn after attacking.

description.en: Attacks all enemies by creating a powerful gust of wind, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Effect chance increases by 20% when Razorwind Fan is triggered by Windbreak Fan.

get_line.en: I'm Romann Barelit, Knight Commander of Lefundos. Hopefully we can get along well.

story.en: Though he treats everyone with gentleness and kindness, he won't hesitate to do anything for his friend Ervalen, no matter how cruel. To him, Schniel is nothing more than a troublemaker, while Ervalen is a trustworthy liege deserving of unconditional loyalty.

description.en: Knight Commander of Lefundos who is kind to everyone

Attacks the enemy with concentrated mana, before a 35% chance to activate Mana Burst. Effect chance is doubled when the target is silenced.
Mana Burst: Attacks all enemies, decreasing Combat Readiness by a random amount between 15% and 50%.
Reduces the effect of decreased Combat Readiness debuffs inflicted on the caster by {{variable}}.
Attacks all enemies with condensed mana, with a {{variable}} chance to silence for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with condensed mana, dispelling two buffs, before a {{variable}} chance to silence for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Experience the power of Malicus, the Lord of Fire.

story.en: Originally far from what anyone would consider a normal Human, he is now a completely normal upstanding member of society. Every word out of his mouth is considerate and he has impeccable manners.

description.en: A weird cook of the Wild Dog Company who became normal
Attacks an enemy with a sharp dagger, healing the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.
Attacks all enemies with a giant gauntlet, healing the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with a giant gauntlet, before healing the ally with the lowest Health. A critical hit activates Punishment against a random enemy. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.

description.en: Heals an ally and the caster with sacred power, granting invincibility for 1 turn and increasing Attack for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

soul_description.en: Extends the duration of Sacred Power granted to the caster by 1 turn and grants an extra turn.

get_line.en: I will show you the power of the enchanted blade.

story.en: Karin is embroiled in an endless battle against the will of a cursed magical sword, compelled by its power to cause trouble. Though aggressive and cold-hearted while possessed by the sword, she sometimes escapes from the control of it and shows an unexpected side.

description.en: The wielder of a magical blade thirsty for blood
Quickly strikes the enemy with a sword, recovering Health proportional to damage dealt. Caster's Combat Readiness increases by 50% when the enemy is defeated.
As Health decreases, Attack, Defense, and Speed increase.
Attacks all enemies, sacrificing 20% of the caster's Health. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 50% when an enemy is defeated.

The shock of her actions led her to lock herself in the witch's castle, surrounded by nothing but thornbushes and incapable of hurting anyone else.

Tough and beautiful
Queen of Wintenberg

description.en: A dancing girl beloved by everyone for her mysterious charm
Attacks the enemy with a ring, granting a random buff to the caster for 1 turn.

soul_description.en: Grants a random buff to all allies for 2 turns.

description.en: Attacks the enemy with a lavish dance, stunning for 1 turn before stealing two buffs and granting their effects to all allies. When the target has no buffs, decreases cooldown of this skill by 1 turn.
Crosses rings to attack the enemy, dispelling all of the target's buffs before granting immunity to all allies for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Crosses rings to attack the enemy, dispelling all of the target's buffs before granting immunity to all allies for 2 turns. Caster is granted an extra turn when buffs have been dispelled.

get_line.en: Hi hi! Did you miss me?

story.en: A destructive super cute mercenary, the nickname of Super Cute Guardian of the Red Flame fits Armin perfectly. She assures that she will defend fiercely, indifferent of what she destroys while doing so.

description.en: The bright and bubbly self-proclaimed Super Cute Guardian of the Red Flame
Attacks with a large shield, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Decreases damage received by allies by {{variable}}. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
Covers all allies with an aura of holy spirit, granting immunity for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Covers all allies with an aura of holy spirit, granting immunity for 2 turns and invincibility for 1 turn.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: I will do my best.

story.en: Knight Commander of the Order of the Shield, Crozet places a strict emphasis on following the rules, and is notoriously inflexible on them. His excessive uprightness means he often does not realize when others are playing tricks on him.

description.en: Honest and incorruptible, the Knight Commander of the Order of the Shield
Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

Grants a barrier and increased Defense to an ally for 2 turns when the ally's Health is 50% or less after being attacked. Barrier strength increases proportional to the target's max Health. Can be activated once every 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Grants a barrier and increased Defense to an ally for 2 turns when the ally's Health is 50% or less after being attacked. Barrier strength increases proportional to the target's max Health. Can be activated once per turn.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, decreasing their Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, before a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

get_line.en: If you require my strength, I will assist you.

story.en: Corvus was originally a soldier from Rose Apostles until something caused him to lose his faith and grow disillusioned with the world, and now he only wishes for its destruction. However, he still contains a gentle side within him.

description.en: A tired destroyer who despises the world
Attacks with a shield and absorbs some of the damage as Health, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
At the moment the caster is attacked, the caster has a {{variable}} chance of their skill cooldown being decreased by 1 turn, or 2 turns in the case of a critical hit.
Attacks with a lethal hit. Damage dealt is only affected by the caster's Health and does not trigger critical hit. Begins the battle with a full skill cooldown count.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with a lethal hit, recovering Health proportional to damage dealt. Damage dealt is only affected by the caster's Health and does not trigger critical hit. Begins the battle with a full skill cooldown count.

get_line.en: Hmm, who's today's lucky lady?

story.en: Prodigal son and heir of a once-famous merchant guild in Ki Ruburan, he changed greatly after going on an adventure with two of his friends. Upon his return, he took over control of his family's guild, which had since fallen to betrayals and misfortunes, and brought its fortune to new heights under its new name: the Basar Merchant Guild.

description.en: The most brilliant gem in the history of Ki Ruburan
Attacks the enemy with wind, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.

soul_description.en: Attacks all enemies. Increases the amount recovered by Everlasting Oasis.

description.en: Heals all allies after the caster uses a skill. Amount recovered increases proportional to the targets' max Health and the caster's Attack.

Bastet roars, dispelling all debuffs from all allies, before increasing their Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. When this skill is available, decreases damage suffered from a critical hit by 30%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

enhanced_description.en: Bastet roars, dispelling all debuffs and granting immunity for 3 turns to all allies, before increasing their Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. When this skill is available, decreases damage suffered from a critical hit by 30%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

get_line.en: You've been looking for me? You must need some new clothes! Well, you came to the right person. I can make anyone look like a model.

story.en: A designer who learned how to sew when she was taken in by Straze as a girl. After realizing that ever since he took hold of Fastus, Straze changed, she decides to look for a model to put a stop to his schemes.

description.en: An ill-tempered designer and Luluca's reliable supporter
Attacks the enemy with scissors, with a {{variable}} chance to silence for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

When an enemy's turn ends, gains 5 Fighting Spirit for each debuff inflicted on an ally. Starts the first battle with {{variable}} Fighting Spirit. When the caster's Fighting Spirit is full at the end of somebody's turn, consumes all Fighting Spirit to dispel all debuffs from the caster and increase Combat Readiness by 40%.
Decreases debuff durations of all allies by 2 turns and gets on stage to attack all enemies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

enhanced_description.en: Decreases debuff durations of all allies by 2 turns and gets on stage to attack all enemies, increasing their skill cooldown by 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

get_line.en: I am the Spirit Lord Destina. But now... I am the Saint of Light.

story.en: Nicknamed "the Beast of the Western Light," Destina is a master of light and metal who has physically manifested in the image of her deeply beloved Soul Weaver, Ruele.

description.en: Beast of the Western Light, a Spirit Lord of Light and Autumn
Attacks the enemy with a staff and heals the ally with the lowest Health. Healing increases proportional to the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Attacks the enemy and greatly heals all allies. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.

description.en: Blesses an ally, recovering their Health and increasing their Combat Readiness by 50%. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

Grants all allies the blessing of a Spirit Lord, dispelling all debuffs and recovering Health. When ally is debuffed, their Combat Readiness will also be increased by 15%. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Grants all allies the blessing of a Spirit Lord, dispelling all debuffs before recovering Health. When an ally is debuffed, their Combat Readiness will also be increased by 15% per debuff. This effect can only be applied up to 4 times. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Hello. I am a sister of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, Diene Tali.

story.en: Diene, Saint of Ezera, received the Goddess's divine revelation and fearlessly led the world to victory against the Archdemon, even without the Heir of the Covenant. Later, she became Ezera's queen.

description.en: A staunchly pious nun of Ezera
Emits a ray of brilliant light, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Effect doubles when caster is buffed.
With the Blessings of the Goddess, covers all allies with a barrier for 2 turns before dispelling one debuff. Barrier strength increases proportional to the target's max Health.
A miracle of the Goddess manifests, increasing Attack of all allies for 3 turns, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

enhanced_description.en: A miracle of the Goddess manifests, increasing Attack and Critical Hit Resistance of all allies for 3 turns, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

soul_description.en: All skill cooldowns decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: Him, I'd love to cook him once.

story.en: A genius holding the power of inferno in his hands after swearing a compact with Malicus, the Lord of Fire, Dingo became a chef to make full use of his abilities. He sees all living creatures as potential ingredients.

description.en: The master chef obsessed with ingredients over all else
Cuts the enemy with a cleaver, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict bleeding for 2 turns. After attack, there's a 30% chance to activate Quick Grill.

Attacks all enemies with the Glove Oven, recovering the caster's Health. When the enemy is bleeding, has a {{variable}} chance to inflict burn for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to damage dealt.

Provides all allies with a meal, dispelling all debuffs and increasing Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns before decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn. Every time an enemy dies, the cooldown for this skill decreases by 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Provides all allies with a meal, dispelling all debuffs and increasing Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns before decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn. Grants the caster an extra turn. Every time an enemy dies, the cooldown for this skill decreases by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Competition isn't just about fighting.

story.en: A half-Gear who was born to a Human and a Gear. After being attacked by Humans, she held a deep distrust towards them, but after meeting various people she resolved those feelings. She loves humanity and nature and hates to fight, but will do so when necessary, making use of her wings, Necro and Undine.

description.en: A pure-hearted half-Gear confronting fate

name.en: I Used This to Catch Fish

description.en: Attacks all enemies with the power of magic, with a 25% chance each to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases on debuffed enemies.
Attacks all enemies with a powerful ray, extending the duration of debuffs by 1 turn, except for those which prevent the enemy from moving.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with a powerful ray, extending the duration of debuffs by 1 turn, except for those which prevent the enemy from moving, before decreasing Combat Readiness by 50%.

description.en: Unleashes a giant explosion to attack all enemies. The attack misses, but inflicts decreased Speed, Attack, and Hit Chance for 2 turns regardless.

get_line.en: Will you please...become my doll? I'll make you so pretty...

story.en: A Banshee who dreams of a peaceful life in a house full of dolls. Unfortunately, her means of achieving her dreams are extremely violent. Tired of trying to collect dolls, she's now on a journey to learn how to make them herself.

description.en: A mad Banshee who would do anything for her dream, no matter the risk
Claws the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 10% per sleep debuff inflicted.
Attacks the enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. When the enemy is asleep, decreases Defense for 2 turns and deals additional damage equivalent to 15% of the target's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. When the enemy is asleep, decreases Defense for 2 turns and deals additional damage equivalent to 30% of the target's max Health.

get_line.en: I am Dominiel Nixied, successor to the Nixied Clan.

story.en: Successor of a clan that has long served the Spirit Lord Nixied. After incredible effort she finally succeeded in harnessing Nixied's power, but still lacks confidence in her abilities.

description.en: Hard-working mage blessed by the Spirit Lord Nixied
Throws ice fragments at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.
Casts a barrier over all allies for 2 turns with frost magic. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

enhanced_description.en: Casts a barrier and reflect on all allies for 2 turns with frost magic. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

soul_description.en: All skill cooldowns decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with a large block of ice, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn and a {{variable}} chance to decrease Combat Readiness by 30%.

get_line.en: I'll do my best not to let you down.

story.en: Born to a noble Taranor family, Doris was forced to flee to Reingar after receiving a huge inheritance to escape her greedy stepmother. She wants to heal those wounded with her magic.

description.en: A noble lady who embraces those wounded
Attacks with light energy, before a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

Recites the Celebration of Light, recovering the Health of all allies and granting continuous healing and increased Defense for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Recovers an ally's Health and increases their Combat Readiness by 35% with light magic. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Recovers an ally's Health and increases their Combat Readiness by 50% with light magic. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

get_line.en: Good to meet you. My...name is...Eaton.

story.en: A mysterious Golem who stops people from entering certain areas, their muddled memories mean they don't know what they are protecting or why. Recently, they have begun to question whether they really ever were a Human, or if they are simply a Golem with the memories of a Human. Every time they encounter Humans they approach them out of pure curiosity, but often end up fighting due to a rumor that was spread in the past.

description.en: A lonely guard with fading memories
Strongly knees the enemy, with a 75% chance each to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Receives 30% of damage taken by an ally in their place. Only the highest damage distribution effect will be applied. Increases max Health by {{variable}}.
Releases strong energy, dispelling all debuffs inflicted on the caster before granting a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Releases strong energy, dispelling all debuffs inflicted on the caster before granting a barrier and immunity for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Did... Did you call for me? Oh, you didn't? W-Was I not supposed to come here? Oh, sorry...

story.en: A Half-Elf who made a name for herself as a high wizard in Lefundos long, long ago. She disappeared without a trace after causing a massive explosion in a war.

description.en: A high wizard born in the shadow of misfortune
Attacks the enemy with shards of ice, with a {{variable}} chance to make them unhealable for 1 turn.

Attacks all enemies with an explosion of ice, dispelling one buff before decreasing Combat Readiness by a random amount between 5% and 20%. A critical hit will decrease Combat Readiness by an additional 10%.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Releases energy to attack all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Releases energy to attack all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn. Increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 5% according to the number of critical hits made.

get_line.en: Stand up and walk. Keep moving forward. You've got two good legs, so use them.

story.en: The Fullmetal Alchemist who shows an innate talent for alchemy. The Automail he equips as his right arm and left leg is the most distinguishable trait. Though he is gifted with a genius brain and an aptitude for fighting, there is nothing that enrages him more than being commented on for his short height.

description.en: A genius alchemist who has a steel arm and leg.
Attacks the enemy with a transmuted blade, and grants a ++barrier++ to the caster for 1 turn. Damage dealt and barrier strength increase proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

After being attacked, when the caster has a debuff, **dispels one debuff** and activates Rise!. Rise! can only be activated once per turn.
Rise!: **Attacks all enemies** with ground thorns, **dispelling one buff** and inflicting a --random debuff-- for 2 turns, before **increasing Combat Readiness** by 20%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

Attacks the enemy together with Alphones. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, **damage sharing effects are ignored**. Damage dealt increases proprotional to the **caster's max Health**. Damage dealt increases every time this skill is used and can stack up to 3 times.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy together with Alphones, and **increase Combat Readiness** by 50%. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, **damage sharing effects are ignored**. Damage dealt increases proprotional to the **caster's max Health**. Damage dealt increases every time this skill is used and can stack up to 3 times.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: I'm Elena, a descendant of the stars.

story.en: From a young age, her parents taught her the doctrine of the stars. Despite her youth, she now leads the faithful of Constella with her unwavering devotion and strong connection to the Spirits.

description.en: High Priestess of Constella gazing up at the shining stars
Attacks with the power of the stars, dispelling one debuff each from two allies.

soul_description.en: Dispels all debuffs from all allies.

description.en:
When an ally suffers an attack that targets all enemies, decreases the damage received by {{variable}} and activates Consecrated Ground. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. Consecrated Ground can be activated once every 2 turns.
Consecrated Ground: Recovers the Health of all allies. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Attacks all enemies with a meteor shower, granting invincibility to all allies for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with a meteor shower, granting invincibility for 1 turn and increased Effect Resistance for 2 turns to all allies.

get_line.en: My romance clip is totally empty!

story.en: Elphelt is a warm-hearted girl who loves nature and animals, and the type of person who would never ignore someone who is lonely or in pain. Her optimistic personality makes her believe that nothing is impossible. She is a daydreamer who often gets lost in her imagination and loves a romantic tale.

description.en: A pure, optimistic girl who wants to understand love
Fires a barrage of bullets at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to make them unable to be buffed for 1 turn.

Traps the enemy in a cake, before attacking them with a cake-cutting blade and increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. When the enemy is asleep, decreases Defense of all enemies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.
Dispels two buffs from the enemy before shooting a bullet of love, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to sleep for 2 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn.

enhanced_description.en: Dispels two buffs from the enemy before shooting a bullet of love, with a {{variable}} chance each to put them to sleep and decrease Defense for 2 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn.

get_line.en: I'm still an apprentice, but I'll do my best!

story.en: A knight apprentice of the Order of the Sword, Elson. He is originally from Ezera, yet his parents left for Savara to set up a business of their own. He is kind and friendly but lacks confidence.

description.en: A kind and friendly Order of the Sword apprentice
Attacks the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn.
Attacks all enemies with Meteor Shower of Light and recovers the Health of all allies. Healing increases proportional to the ally's max Health.
Recovers Health and increases Defense of all allies for 2 turns with strengthening magic. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Recovers Health and increases Attack and Defense of all allies for 2 turns with strengthening magic. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Hmph, pleased to meet you.

story.en: A nasty, arrogant and ambitious man with an inflated sense of his own abilities, Enott used his connections with a noble Ezera family to become a priest of the Rose Apostles.

description.en: A sly and selfish priest of the Rose Apostles
Attacks with an axe, with a {{variable}} chance to cause bleeding for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.
Attacks with a sharp blow, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Defense and make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.
Corrects stance, increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns and Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.

enhanced_description.en: Corrects stance, increasing Attack and Critical Hit Chance of the caster for 2 turns and Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Tell me what you desire, and I will give it to you. In return, you will become my sword, unquestioning and unyielding.

story.en: The son of the previous king, Tarman, and his concubine, Camellia. Ervalen and Schniel did not get along well initially, but after Schniel exposed the abuse Ervalen was receiving and began taking care of him, they grew close.

description.en: An illegitimate child of the Lefundos royal family aiming for everyone's recognition
Rapidly attacks the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Attacks the enemy repeatedly. When the enemy's max Health is greater than the caster's max Health, Combat Readiness of the caster increases proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 30%.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy repeatedly and grants the caster immunity for 1 turn. When the enemy's max Health is greater than the caster's max Health, Combat Readiness of the caster increases proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 30%.

description.en: Attacks the enemy with a sword, adopting a counterattacking stance and granting a barrier to the caster for 2 turns. When the enemy's max Health is greater than the caster's max Health, damage dealt increases proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 60%. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

soul_description.en: Extends the duration of buffs granted by Heir to the Throne by 1 turn and grants an extra turn.

get_line.en: Have you seen Kayron, the guy running around with a huge pocket watch? Oh, wait a second... Where am I?

story.en: Tenebria managed to break into the world of magical fairy tales. As she acts on her wishes without concern for the original plot, the once peaceful fairytale land plunges deeper and deeper into chaos.

description.en: A beautiful and horrific harbinger of chaos in a fairytale land
Attacks the enemy with a mystical power, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two poison effects for 1 turn.

Activates Shuffle when an ally is attacked by an enemy inflicted with provoke or redirected provoke. Shuffle can only be activated once per turn.
Shuffle: Attacks all enemies and inflicts a random debuff for 1 turn. A successful attack inflicts additional damage when the target is inflicted with provoke or redirected provoke. Additional damage increases proportional to the target's max Health.
Lures all enemies in with a tea party and attacks, making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns and inflicting redirected provoke for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Lures all enemies in with a tea party and attacks, dispelling one buff, making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns, and inflicting redirected provoke for 1 turn.

get_line.en: Who am I? Hmm... You’re better off not knowing.

story.en: After being taken into a cult at a young age and enduring a childhood of suffering, Faithless Lidica finally managed to escape and is now on the run. Naturally, this experience has given her a skepticism towards religion and hatred of fanatics.

description.en: Striving for a new life while on the run
Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.
Binds all enemies with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 25% per target. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

enhanced_description.en: Binds all enemies with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 25% per target and all other allies' by 5% per target. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

description.en: Attacks the enemy indiscriminately, increasing skill cooldown to max. A critical hit grants all allies skill nullifier once, negating damage received from the next skill attack.

get_line.en: I'm Kluri, a mercenary. My motto is minimum effort, maximum reward, so don't give me anything too difficult.

story.en: Kluri started raising a falcon in hope of reducing her workload. Although it ended up doing the exact opposite, she's carried on raising it for fun. Perhaps it learned from its master, because it will never do anything too difficult unless Kluri orders it to.

description.en: A sharp-eyed mercenary, and friend of Fluri
Slams the enemy, increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}}. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Recovers {{variable}} Health of the caster at the beginning of every turn.
Fluri flies towards the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel all buffs, before a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Fluri flies towards the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel all buffs, before a {{variable}} chance each to provoke and decrease Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Are you someone whom I can trust?

story.en: Fallen Cecilia is chasing a mage who turned her family into dark magic stones, dreaming of the day she can get her revenge and join her loved ones again.

description.en: A dark dragon bound by a desire for revenge and an endless grudge
Attacks with a spear of revenge, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Grants a barrier for 2 turns to the ally with the lowest Health at the end of the caster's turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Grants a barrier for 2 turns to all allies at the start of the battle, and grants a barrier for 2 turns to the ally with the lowest Health at the end of the caster's turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

description.en: Attacks all enemies in an explosion of spiteful emotions. Grants all allies skill nullifier, negating damage received from the next skill attack. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: I know I can fight better than anyone!

story.en: The second magic doll to be created in Reingar, modeled on Maya with incredible combat skills and a belligerent attitude. She is the type to learn and grow from her experiences, but having been created only a short time ago, she tends to be childish and overly honest about her feelings. She is fond of her sparring partner, Zerato.

description.en: A magic doll of Reingar created for battles
Attacks with a blunt weapon, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Has a {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff and be granted increased Defense for 2 turns when attacked. Can only be triggered once per turn.

enhanced_description.en: Has a {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff and be granted increased Defense for 2 turns when attacked.

description.en: Attacks with a powerful smash. Damage dealt increases by 300% when the enemy’s Health is 30% or less. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster’s Defense. Grants the caster an extra turn when the enemy is defeated.

get_line.en: Are you friend or foe? Not that it matters. You'll be on my side once we're finished.

story.en: A practical negotiator, Flan is devoted to the development of the city she works for. As she is a newer model, she is equipped with a variety of useful functions, but she lacks durability. She adores Landy like a real big sister.

description.en: Politia's foreign minister, representing the city's interests
Attacks the enemy with a gun, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff.
Encourages an ally, increasing Attack and Critical Hit Damage for 2 turns before increasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.
Drives a hard bargain against all enemies, decreasing Defense for 2 turns before decreasing Combat Readiness by 15%.

enhanced_description.en: Drives a hard bargain against all enemies, making them unhealable and decreasing Defense for 2 turns before decreasing Combat Readiness by 15%.

get_line.en: Here I am! More beautiful than the morning dew, more graceful than a blooming rose—I am Tieria.

story.en: A bounty hunter chasing criminals across Orbis. She's as beautiful as a flower and loves to be complimented for her looks.

description.en: A beautiful and lonely adventurer chasing criminals
Attacks the enemy with an axe, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. A critical hit will increase damage dealt.
Releases condensed energy at all enemies, recovering Health of the caster proportional to damage dealt.

enhanced_description.en: Releases condensed energy at all enemies, recovering Health of the caster proportional to damage dealt. Resets this skill's cooldown when an enemy is defeated.

description.en: Dashes towards the enemy and cuts them down with a powerful strike, decreasing Defense for 2 turns. A critical hit will grant immunity to the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Do you need a leader?

story.en: A man of principle, Furious believes that a leader should serve the community, not individuals. He believes that the citylord is an important cog in the machine that is Aakhen.

description.en: The stubborn Citylord of Aakhen
Fires a gun while dashing towards the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to burn for 2 turns.
Raises morale of all allies, granting increased Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Raises morale of all allies, granting increased Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns, before granting an extra turn to the caster.

description.en: Attacks with a fatal shot, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: It is a general's duty to lead his people along the right path.

story.en: Daring and responsible, General Purrgis will never abandon his subordinates in a dangerous situation, and commands all of their respect.

description.en: A cool-headed general commanding the respect of all
Mows down the enemy with a great sword, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
After being attacked, increases Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}}.
Gives the command to charge, dealing damage to all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to stun two random enemies for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Gives the command to charge, dealing damage to all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to stun two random enemies for 1 turn, before increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: Why would anyone "talk it out" when they could just use their fists? Let's go, right now! Whoever wins, wins!

story.en: Back when he was a street fighter, Glenn was found by Godmother after being assaulted and left there, broken and dying in the street. He respects her for saving him and giving him a place to stay.

description.en: A reformed vigilante of the back streets
Rapidly shoots the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Fires a missile at the enemy, and when the enemy is defeated, inflicts extinction. Hit Chance is increased by 15% when using this skill.
Using an enhancement cube, grants the caster increased Attack (Greater) for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Using an enhancement cube, grants the caster increased Attack (Greater) for 2 turns and an extra turn.

get_line.en: Uhh... Hello?

story.en: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. When the ruins are masked in fog, she sings songs of rumors. Looking like a small lantern flame flickering in the darkness, if you allow yourself to be tempted you will lose your life in a moment.

description.en: A Banshee like lonely rain falling on a foggy city
Has a {{variable}} chance of being granted an extra turn after attacking the enemy.

enhanced_description.en: Has a {{variable}} chance of being granted an extra turn after attacking the enemy. When the caster is debuffed, the chance is doubled.

description.en: Increases Attack by {{variable}} and Speed by {{variable}} when the caster is debuffed. Grants immunity to stun, sleep, and provoke.
Attacks all enemies with magic, with a {{variable}} chance to transfer all debuffs inflicted on the caster, and dispels all debuffs from the caster.

get_line.en: Well, well... Looks like I've got one more troublemaker to take care of.

story.en: A former police executive in Politia, Godmother is now in charge of a vigilante group in the Unregulated Area. Thanks to her, what was once a lawless area is now united and properly managed.

description.en: Godmother of the back streets who leads the discarded
Shoots the enemy with a pistol, with a {{variable}} chance to target them for 2 turns.
Attacks with a powerful missile, before a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Hit Chance and Attack for 1 turn.
Utilizes the power of an enhancement cube, granting all allies increased Speed for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Utilizes the power of an enhancement cube, granting all allies increased Speed and Effectiveness for 2 turns.

get_line.en: It is a great chief's responsibility to look after all of Meldrec and the Muhr.

story.en: After being chosen by Malicus in the Great Chief Exam, Khawana has become the great chief. She successfully unites all tribes into one unified Meldrec, but the land soon falls into civil war due to Inferno Khawazu. Not once has she beaten Khawazu, and for that, she holds both great respect as well as a sense of inferiority toward him.

description.en: The chosen successor who wields a pure flame
Cuts the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to restrict for 1 turn. Has a {{variable}} chance to restrict for 2 turns when the target is a Light elemental enemy.
Increases Critical Hit Chance by {{variable}}. When an ally is attacked by a Dual Attack, increases Attack of the caster by 15%. Increased Attack effect can stack up to five times.
Releases power to dispel two debuffs from all allies and increase Speed for 2 turns. Grants an extra turn.

enhanced_description.en: Releases power to dispel two debuffs from all allies and grant increased Speed and a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack. Grants an extra turn.

get_line.en: Hi! Will you introduce yourself? Will you play with me?

story.en: An ever-cheerful traveler, Aither loves life on the road. As he embarks on a journey to find his lost memories, he is often followed by small animals.

description.en: A free and nimble little bird that has lost its memories
Attacks with spirit power, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.
Attacks with spirit power, and grants caster a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Attack.
Attacks with spirit power, and heals all allies. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.

enhanced_description.en: Delivers a blow to the enemy with spirit power, and heals all allies before granting continuous healing for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.

get_line.en: The worth of a man is not determined by appearance but by actions. I'll forge my own way no matter what!

story.en: A veteran of the Archdemon War, Gunther is often misunderstood because of his rough-looking face, but he is a highly-talented treasure hunter.

description.en: A carefree and tough warrior known as the Slaughterer
Attacks with an axe, with a 50% chance to cause bleeding for 2 turns.
The caster does not deal a critical hit, but Attack increases by {{variable}}, and Critical Hit Resistance increases by 70%.
Attacks with an axe, stunning for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with an axe, stunning for 1 turn and decreasing Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Who do you want me to kill?

story.en: Trained since he was young, Haste is the optimal assassin. Part of the Sicar assassin organization, he is fearless and hates losing. He has no interest in other people, but deep down he yearns for the same close relationships they hold.

description.en: An aloof boy trained in assassination
Attacks with an enormous scythe, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict bleeding for 2 turns. Steals one buff if the target is an Earth elemental Hero.
Attacks the enemy with a scythe and recovers the Health of all allies. Amount recovered increases proportional to damage dealt.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy with a scythe, making them unhealable and inflicting vampiric touch for 2 turns, and recovers the Health of all allies. Amount recovered increases proportional to damage dealt.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with Envoy's Scythe, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict three bleeding effects for 2 turns. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies. Detonates any bleeding effects inflicted on Earth elemental targets at the end of the turn.

get_line.en: In this cruel world...only the strongest survive.

story.en: A  descendant of Suin taken as slaves by settlers from Ritania. He was able to earn his freedom at a young age thanks to the sacrifices of his family but had to become a street fighter in the criminal underground to survive. Just as he began opening up to others and finding inner peace, he lost all of his friends after his disciple Batisse went on a rampage. Now, he seeks revenge.

description.en: A wandering Suin burdened with guilt
Smashes the enemy with their knee, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Attacks the enemy with wind pressure. Activates Wind Pressure again when an enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Releases energy to all allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Releases energy to all allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns, before increasing Speed of the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: I'm Hazel Stressa, Black Sheep-- Uhh, I mean, clerk of the Student Council.

story.en: Younger sister of Ginger, the vice president of the student council, Hazel is the self-styled "Black Sheep" clerk of the student council. An inflexible, sharp-tongued slob, yet also an extensively knowledgeable model student. She has a detailed understanding of the personal relationships and weaknesses of everyone in Reingar.

description.en: The savvy model student clerk of the Student Council
Attacks with fire magic, with a {{variable}} chance to make unhealable for 2 turns.

Heals the target proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%. Amount recovered is doubled when the target's Health is 50% or less.

Uses strengthening magic to increase Attack of all allies for 1 turn before recovering Health and dispelling one debuff. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Uses strengthening magic to increase Attack of all allies for 2 turns before recovering Health and dispelling one debuff. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Don't you dare look down on me. I will gore you.

story.en: Though small in stature, Helga is a fierce eyed bounty hunter who is never without her trademark axe and horned helm. Rough-spoken and rough-tempered, she has no time for those who look down on her, and prefers to work alone.

description.en: A treasure hunter with a love for big axes and horned helms
Attacks with an axe, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will have a 50% chance to extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.

description.en: Encourages allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Wow, there’s delicious food everywhere I look! Oh, but now's not the time to daydream, I have to get in line!

story.en: For her vacation, Yufine's visiting a resort with a special goal in mind: to try each and every dish she's never seen in Ezera!

description.en: A lively Dragon girl who is passionate about having fun and eating

Attacks the enemy by tearing up a food market, with a {{variable}} chance to --burn-- for 1 turn. When used on the caster's turn, Just One Bite! ♡ becomes an attack that targets all enemies. Changed attack is **unaffected by elemental disadvantage** and does not trigger a Dual Attack.

Reduces the **effect of decreased Combat Readiness** debuffs inflicted on all allies by {{variable}}. This skill effect does not stack with other passive skills of the same name. Increase Evasion by 35%, and increase Evasion by an additional 35% when the caster is at max Health.
**Dispels two debuffs** from all allies and **attacks all enemies** in the middle of a night market. ++Increased Attack++ of all allies for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: **Dispels two debuffs** from all allies and **attacks all enemies** in the middle of a night market. ++Increased Attack++ of all allies for 2 turns and **Combat Readiness** by 20%.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: Nice meeting you.

story.en: Hurado is a mercenary with no memories, wandering in search for his home. Unlike his intimidating appearance, he is extremely kind and sincere, and vulnerable to being conned by others.

description.en: Where am I from? A wandering mercenary who lost his memory
Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to silence for 1 turn.
Decreases amount recovered of all enemies by {{variable}}, and increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 20% when the enemy uses a non-attack skill.
Attacks all enemies with dark magic, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff before decreasing Combat Readiness by 15%.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with dark magic, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel all buffs before decreasing Combat Readiness by 15%.

get_line.en: To exceed one's limit is impossible without exerting an extraordinary amount of effort.

story.en: In the past, Hwayoung used to be one of Natalon's strongest fighters. However, both of her arms were severely injured during a fight against the Suin. Some time later, Hwayoung took Ken as her pupil, but following his disapperance, she settled in a human village in the Prairie.

description.en: A wandering fighter who works hard to transcend her limits.
Attacks the enemy with a kick. When the caster is buffed, a successful attack inflicts additional damage proportional to the **caster's Attack**.

Attack increases by {{variable}}. When attacking, **cannot trigger a critical hit**. **Damage** suffered from a **critical hit decreases** by 30%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. At the start of the battle and at the end of the turn, grants a ++barrier++ to the caster for 1 turn.
