Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

Attack the enemy with a secret technique and grants ++immunity++ to the caster for 2 turns. When the target's max Health is greater than the caster's max Health, **penetrates** the target's Defense, with penetration rate increasing proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 100%.

enhanced_description.en: After **dispelling all debuffs** from the caster, attacks the enemy with a secret technique and grants ++immunity++ to the caster for 2 turns. When the target's max Health is greater than the caster's max Health, **penetrates** the target's Defense, with penetration rate increasing proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 100%.

get_line.en: My name? Call me whatever you want. Everyone else does. "Hey," "you there," "scrap metal..." I'm sure you'll come up with something.

story.en: Ian behaves very courteously, but deep down, he questions why he needs to wait on Humans hand and foot. He dreams about a future where the roles are reversed and his kind rules over Humans.

description.en: An Automatic Doll from the stars who guards his inner thoughts closely
Fires an enhanced pistol, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff from the enemy.
Supports all allies using an enhancement cube, granting increased Attack for 2 turns. Grants an extra turn to the caster.
Attacks all enemies with powerful explosives, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff, before a 75% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with powerful explosives, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff, before a 75% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns. Grants the caster skill nullifier once.

get_line.en: My name is Iseria, the Knight of White Flowers, and the keeper of oaths.

story.en: Second-in-Command of the Order of the Sword, Iseria is an Elf unable to return to her ancestral home of Dun Blyraia due to some reason. Known as the Knight of White Flowers, she has a calm and solemn personality.

description.en: The Knight of White Flowers, protector of a solemn oath
Throws swords at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Increases effect chance by 50% and increases damage dealt. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.

description.en: Resets skill cooldown of an ally except for the caster with light energy.

enhanced_description.en: Resets skill cooldown of an ally except for the caster with light energy. Grants an extra turn.

description.en: Attacks the enemy with a giant Magic Sword, dispelling all buffs, before decreasing Defense and making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Your psyche is... Ehehe... Okay, yeah, let's just start.

story.en: An artificial being that was created to stop Justice's revival. With half of the soul of Sol's past lover, Aria, she has a split personality: one is that of a collected adult, and the other is that of a child-like one. Therefore, in order to control her mood swings, she wears a mask when in battle.

description.en: A mischievous fighter who fights together with Servants.

Attacks the enemy with a servant, with a {{variable}} chance to --stun-- for 1 turn. After attacking on the caster's turn, when the target has a debuff, activates Dust Attack as an **extra attack**.
Dust Attack: Attacks the enemy by throwing them into the air, granting ++stealth++ to the caster for 1 turn.

At the start of the battle, grants ++Chain of Chiron++ to the ally in the back row for 2 turns. After an ally attacks, when the target is stunned, **increase Combat Readiness** of all allies by {{variable}}. This effect is activated after all of the attacker's effects have occurred, and can only be activated once every 3 turns.

++Increase Attack++ of the caster for 2 turns, before attacking the enemy by swallowing them with a jack-o'-lanter. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%. When the target has a debuff, damage dealt increases.

enhanced_description.en: ++Increase Attack++ of the caster for 2 turns, before attacking the enemy by swallowing them with a jack-o'-lanter. When the enemy is defeated, grants an **extra turn**. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%. When the target has a debuff, damage dealt increases.

get_line.en: I will do my best to live up to your expectations.

story.en: A mercenary from the Itan Clan, Jecht is committed to self-discipline and hopes to improve the treatment of his fellow Suin by becoming a skilled and famous warrior.

description.en: A hard worker who dreams of becoming the world's strongest mercenary
Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.
{{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff inflicted on an ally at the beginning of each turn.
Attacks all enemies with wind magic, granting continuous healing to all allies for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with wind magic, granting continuous healing and increased Speed to all allies for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Do you have some more work for me?

story.en: A calm and cautious mage of the Rose Apostles, Jena is rarely agitated by anything. She is childhood friends with fellow Rose Apostle, Lidica.

description.en: A composed mage of the Rose Apostles
Attacks with a staff, dealing damage proportional to number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.
Casts weakening magic on all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Casts weakening magic on all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack and Speed for 2 turns. Decreased Speed debuff ignores Effect Resistance.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with frost magic, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns.

get_line.en: This is my duty. I will go with you until the world ends.

story.en: An Heir of the Sixth World, Kise is leader of the Nocturnes. She fought every battle against the Archdemon alongside the Guardian Kromcruz. Though she can be sluggish and sharp-tongued, she cares greatly for her fellow Heirs.

description.en: An observer of fate, the Heir who watches over the world
Attacks with a scythe, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies with a scythe, with a 75% chance to dispel a buff from each enemy. Damage dealt increases with more enemies.
Attacks all enemies by distorting space and time, with a {{variable}} chance to increase skill cooldown twice by 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies by distorting space and time, with a {{variable}} chance to increase skill cooldown three times by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Public Security Club Officer Judith, reporting in!

story.en: A cute and cheerful member of Reingar's Public Security Club, Judith originally came to Reingar as a thief with her eyes on magical artifacts. However, she enjoyed her time in the Public Security Club so much, she eventually forgot her original goal. She is an old friend of the Longtail Company's commander, Armin.

description.en: A Public Security Club officer, who on second glance is revealed as a thief
Attacks with dual-wielded swords. When the caster is stealthed, has a {{variable}} chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn.
At the moment the caster is attacked, has a {{variable}} chance to become stealthed for 1 turn.
Increases the Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}}.

enhanced_description.en: Increases the Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}}, and grants stealth for 1 turn.

get_line.en: Protector of justice, truth, magic and! Uh, what comes after that? In any case, Lieutenant Karin has arrived!

story.en: Second Lieutenant in the Public Security Club of Reingar, Karin struggles to maintain order in the Magical Academy, a place brimming with dangerous creativity. Many call her the conscience and the real big boss of the Public Security Club.

description.en: The righteous prosecutor of the Public Security Club
Strikes the enemy with a sword. A critical hit will decrease skill cooldown by 1 turn.
Slashes the enemy. A critical hit will decrease Defense for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Slashes the enemy. A critical hit will decrease Defense for 1 turn and grant an extra turn to the caster.

description.en: Cuts the enemy with lightning speed. Damage dealt increases with a critical hit.

get_line.en: I knew you'd ask for me soon.

story.en: An abandoned child found by magical scholars of Witchaven, Kawerik enlisted in the Enhanced Magic Division and made important contributions in the Archdemon War that Diene took part in. However, the side effects of the experiment have left him suffering from paralysis that is slowly killing him and have turned him into a cold-blooded contract killer.

description.en: A mage left with nothing after seeking his revenge
Approaches the enemy through subspace and attacks, before a {{variable}} chance to silence for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster’s Speed.

Attacks the enemy in a dimensional corridor, with a {{variable}} chance each to dispel two buffs before increasing skill cooldowns by 1 turn twice. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's Speed.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy in a dimensional corridor, with a {{variable}} chance each to dispel two buffs before increasing skill cooldowns by 1 turn twice. Increases Speed of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's Speed.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with an explosion, silencing for 1 turn, before granting stealth to the caster for 2 turns. Penetrates Defense by 30%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster’s Speed.

get_line.en: I have descended in answer to your call.

story.en: An Acolyte, and commander of an army of undead known as the Dust Walkers. It is said that he demands your soul and loyalty in return for releasing you from your grudges.

description.en: The Shadow King who deals in grudges
Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health.

Grants immortality for 1 turn when the caster receives lethal damage and resets skill cooldown of Apocalypse.
Can only be activated once every {{variable}} turn(s).
On the caster's turn, when buffed and using Void Slash, the skill will become an AoE attack and does not trigger Dual Attack.

Attacks the enemy by exploding the Archdemon's Might contained within the sword. When the enemy is defeated, extends the duration of any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy by exploding the Archdemon's Might contained within the sword, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, extends the duration of any buffs already granted to the caster by 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

get_line.en: Leave everything to me!

story.en: Born an orphan, Ken has faced many hardships in his life, but manages to maintain a bright and optimistic personality. He believes the only way to survive is through strength, and dedicates his life to training and always admires the strong.

description.en: I will become stronger! A lively fist-fighter

Attacks with a flurry of strikes, with a 50% chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns. --Burns-- the enemy for 2 turns when the caster is granted ++vigor++. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

Kicks the enemy, --decreasing Defense-- for 2 turns before granting the caster ++increased Speed++ for 2 turns. Gains 40 **Fighting Spirit** when an enemy is defeated. When the caster is granted ++vigor++, **ignores Effect Resistance**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

Delivers a powerful blow after a flurry of strikes, --stunning-- for 1 turn. Grants ++vigor++ to the caster for 3 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**. Starts the first battle with 50 **Fighting Spirit**, and gains 5 **Fighting Spirit** when attacked.

enhanced_description.en: Delivers a powerful blow after a flurry of strikes, --decreasing Attack-- for 2 turns and --stunning-- for 1 turn. Grants ++vigor++ to the caster for 3 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**. Starts the first battle with 50 **Fighting Spirit**, and gains 5 **Fighting Spirit** when attacked.

get_line.en: Hi! I'm Khawana! Where are you from?

story.en: Despite being the clever younger sister of the Great Chief, Khawana holds no political ambitions and is instead far more interested in spending quality time with friends and family, collecting interesting things, and experiencing new cultures.

description.en: A curious and cheerful adventurer from Meldrec
Attacks the enemy with sharp sickles, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two bleeding effects for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy with sharp sickles, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two bleeding effects for 2 turns. If the enemy is debuffed after the attack, additional damage is inflicted.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with a flame guardian, before increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. When all allies are Fire elemental Heroes, grants all allies skill nullifier once. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

Attacks the enemy with a flame guardian, dispelling two buffs before stunning for 1 turn. When all allies are Fire elemental Heroes, increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 20%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

get_line.en: I am the leader of Meldrec.

story.en: A warrior of the Emberstorm tribe who ascended to Great Chief at a young age. He leads Meldrec with a stubborn insistence not to rely on outside assistance, but due to conflict between tribes, invading Unknowns, and the disappearance of Malicus, his troubles are starting to pile up.

description.en: The Great Chief of Meldrec who is undergoing a difficult trial

Attacks the enemy with a ball of flame, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. After attacking, has a 35% chance to activate Burning Vitality.
Burning Vitality: Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%.
When the caster is debuffed after being attacked, dispels all debuffs and increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Can only be activated once every {{variable}} turns.
Attacks with a fiery explosion, making the target unhealable and decreasing Defense for 1 turn each.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with a fiery explosion, making the target unhealable and decreasing Defense for 2 turns each.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c3084_gacha_get)

story.en: Machinery based on the Kikirat. It has cleaning functionality for comfort, but often mistakes Humans for trash.

description.en:
High-tech machinery
modeled after Gigantes
Attacks with a gatling gun, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Increases Defense of the caster by {{variable}} after attacking. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.
Fires indiscriminately at all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

enhanced_description.en: Fires indiscriminately at all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn, before triggering counterattacks from the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

get_line.en: Ah... did you call me?

story.en: An Elf of Dun Blyraia, Kiris left her home after losing her lover to the Archdemon War and joined the Sicar assassin organization. She is often absent-minded, but as you get to know her you discover she possesses an acute sense.

description.en: A Sicar assassin with a lot to hide
Fires a poisoned arrow at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict poison for 2 turns.
Fires a corrosive volley to all enemies, extending any debuff duration by 1 turn.

Strengthens the caster's next attack, increases Combat Readiness by 50%.
Venomous Arrow: Increases effect chance to 100%, and poison effects can be stacked up to 3 times.
Corrosive Volley: Extends debuff duration by 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en:
Strengthens the caster's next attack, granting an extra turn.
Venomous Arrow: Increases effect chance to 100%, and poison effects can be stacked up to 3 times.
Corrosive Volley: Extends debuff duration by 2 turns.

get_line.en: The moonlight brought you to me.

story.en: Leader of the Nocturnes. Having been forced to part with her lover, she now has a tendency to obsess over anything she loves.

description.en: A mysterious woman who appears with the moonlight
Attacks with a scythe. Damage dealt increases by 70% when the target is buffed.
Attacks all enemies with a scythe. Penetrates the enemy's Defense by 30%, and by an additional 30% when the caster is stealthed.

Leaps towards the enemy to attack. Grants the caster stealth and a barrier for 2 turns, before increasing Combat Readiness by 50%. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's current Health.

enhanced_description.en: Leaps towards the enemy to attack, increasing skill cooldowns by 1 turn twice. Grants the caster stealth and a barrier for 2 turns, before increasing Combat Readiness by 50%. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's current Health.

get_line.en: Are you my new servant, meow?

story.en: The Holy Order of the Blue Cross requested that Reingar find a way to calm Clarissa down. Instead, the researchers focused on how cats can still be loved after wreaking havoc. Then they turned her into a cat to eliminate everyone's complaints about her violence.

description.en: Battle-driven sister of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross who turned into a cat
Attacks with a morning star. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. When the caster is granted loveliness, triggers a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.
Attacks all enemies with a morning star while raging, with a {{variable}} chance to make them unhealable for 2 turns. When the caster is granted loveliness, effect chance increases by 20%.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with a morning star while raging, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease buff duration by 2 turns and make them unhealable for 2 turns. When the caster is granted loveliness, effect chance increases by 20%.

description.en: Wiggles tail cutely, decreasing debuff duration on all allies by 2 turns, and granting the caster immunity and loveliness for 3 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn.

get_line.en: Hello, everyone! Kizuna AI here! I'm still trying my hardest, so please keep watching!

story.en: Originally a virtual broadcaster from Earth, Kizuna AI fell into a deep sleep inside of a disc when the planet was destroyed, until one day she found herself in the hands of Yuna, who rebooted her. She hopes to continue learning more about Humans through her new broadcasts on Orbis.

description.en: Hello, everyone! An entertainer forever full of energy
Attacks by firing a heart at the enemy, before dispelling a debuff from an ally. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Dispels a debuff from all allies.

description.en: Heals the ally with the lowest Health at the end of the turn. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Cheers on allies, granting a barrier to all allies for 3 turns, before granting increased Speed to the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Cheers on allies, granting increased Attack and a barrier to all allies for 3 turns, before granting increased Speed to the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: I'm Kluri, a mercenary. My motto is minimum effort, maximum reward, so don't give me anything too difficult.

story.en: A member of Armin's Longtail Company, Kluri's only goal is to earn money to live a decent life. She hates anything that's tedious. Having left Dun Blyraia at a young age, she is unaware she is an Elf.

description.en: A mercenary doing the bare minimum to earn her paycheck
Strikes in the direction of the enemy, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Recovers {{variable}} Health of the caster at the beginning of every turn.
Has a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Has a {{variable}} chance to provoke and decrease Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Greetings, my name is Kraureit Roheil.

story.en: One of the Knights of Taranor, Krau's outgoing and confident personality often causes people to misunderstand his intentions, but he tends to silently push ahead with what he thinks is right. He is risking everything he has to fight for the future of his homeland.

description.en: A self-confident and forward-looking knight
Attacks the enemy with a swordstorm, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

Shoves the enemy with a shield, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, before granting increased Defense to all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Summons the Guardian Ziegfried to attack, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health, penetrating Defense. This attack cannot trigger a critical hit.

enhanced_description.en: Summons the Guardian Ziegfried to attack, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health, penetrating Defense. Also grants a barrier to the caster for 2 turns, with strength proportional to the caster's max Health. This attack cannot trigger a critical hit.

get_line.en: I'm Landy, Politia’s chief of police. If you notice anyone suspicious or have a lead for me, don't hesitate to let me know!

story.en: A woman of principles who works hard to do what's best for her city. As she is an older model, she lacks a few functions, but she has great durability. She adores Flan like her own little sister.

description.en: Politia's Chief of Police in charge of maintaining public order
Fires at the enemy and increases the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Combat Readiness increase and amount of Fighting Spirit gained are doubled when the enemy is buffed.

name.en: The Chief Is on the Scene

description.en: Increases the caster's Attack by {{variable}} after attacking. This effect can only stack up to 3 times. At the start of the turn, gains 10 Fighting Spirit for each buff granted to an enemy, and when Fighting Spirit is full, resets skill cooldown. Starts the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit.

Fires at all enemies and grants all allies increased Speed for 2 turns, before increasing their Combat Readiness by 15%. When Fighting Spirit is full, consumes all Fighting Spirit to penetrate the target's Defense by 50%.

enhanced_description.en: Fires at all enemies and grants all allies increased Speed for 2 turns, before increasing their Combat Readiness by 15%. When Fighting Spirit is full, consumes all Fighting Spirit to penetrate the target's Defense by 50%. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

get_line.en: Krau, code number: 00. Standing by.

story.en: Leader of the Mechanical Empire Taranor's Special Force Team 7 and Heir to the mobile weapon Ziegfried. He's uncontrollable and does everything his way, but his skill is undeniable. Central Division has granted him the code number 00 as a symbol of his right to act independently.

description.en: A wild card capable of handling anything
Attacks the enemy with a swordstorm, before increasing Speed of the caster for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

After suffering an attack that targets all allies, decreases the caster's skill cooldown by 1 turn and grants a barrier to all allies for 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Barrier effect can only be activated once per turn.

Summons Ziegfried and attacks all enemies. Penetrates Defense, but cannot trigger a critical hit. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Damage dealt increases every time this skill is used and can stack up to 3 times.

enhanced_description.en: Summons Ziegfried and attacks all enemies, before granting immunity to all allies for 2 turns. Penetrates Defense, but cannot trigger a critical hit. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Damage dealt increases every time this skill is used and can stack up to 3 times.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: It's a big world filled with strong people. That's what makes life fun.

story.en: Daughter of a family of sorcerers from Witchaven, the wandering fighter Hataan taught her martial arts and of the outside world as he passed through the city. After he left she lost interest in magic and worked to hone her fighting skills alone. Unsatisfied, she eventually left Witchaven as well to find Hataan and become his disciple.

description.en: An optimistic fighter who just stepped foot into the world
Attacks with a strong fist, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 20%.
Increases Critical Hit Chance by {{variable}}.

Attacks all enemies with a powerful storm, decreasing Combat Readiness by 20%, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with a powerful storm, decreasing Combat Readiness by 20%, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health. When the enemy is defeated with this skill, cooldown does not occur.

get_line.en: I am the aspiring warrior, Leontius Leo! And this is my friend, Racoo! Nice to meet you.

story.en: Born to a family of scholars, Leo grew up learning much of warriors and myth. He is bravely traveling with his pet and good friend Racoo, in hope of realizing his dream of becoming a warrior himself.

description.en: A trouble making joker who dreams of becoming the ultimate warrior
Attacks with a slingshot, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.
Attacks with a slingshot, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and a 50% chance to use Sparrow Dive.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Racoo flies into the enemies like a bullet and attacks all of them, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Racoo flies into the enemies like a bullet and attacks all of them, decreasing Speed for 2 turns, with a 75% chance to stun.

get_line.en: Pleased to meet you. I'm Lidica.

story.en: Expelled from the Rose Apostles, she joined the Phantom CIC to investigate the Land of Death. She wanted to defeat the Unknown and instill faith unto others. However, her rough personality still causes problems within the Phantom CIC.

description.en: A hot-tempered member of the Phantom CIC, hunting Unknown
Attacks with a sword, decreasing Combat Readiness by 10%.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with a sword, decreasing Combat Readiness by 10%. When the enemy is debuffed, decreases Combat Readiness by an additional 10%.

description.en: Attacks all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn, make them unhealable for 1 turn, and dispel one buff.

Attacks the enemy with a whip sword, decreasing buff durations by 1 turn, before decreasing Combat Readiness by 100% and decreasing Speed for 2 turns. Grants the caster skill nullifier once, negating damage received from the next skill attack.

get_line.en: I'm Lilias, of the Perlutia family. I'm sure you've heard of us.

story.en: Trained from birth to be citylord, Lilias is a descendant of the royal family of Perlutia, a kingdom that once ruled the entire continent of Cidonia. She is passionate about becoming the best leader possible for Perland and supports harmony with other cities, but behind all of that lies a deeper ambition.

description.en: Ambitious Citylord of Perland
Takes the lead and attacks, triggering a Dual Attack from a random ally. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Deploys a divine weapon, granting a barrier to the caster for 2 turns, before a {{variable}} chance to provoke the enemy for 2 turns.

Commands the Perland Army to fire on all enemies, decreasing Combat Readiness by 25% and inflicting damage according to the Attack of the Hero with the highest Attack. Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

enhanced_description.en: Dispels all debuffs from all allies and commands the Perland Army to fire on all enemies, decreasing Combat Readiness by 25% and inflicting damage according to the Attack of the Hero with the highest Attack. Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

get_line.en: You've been looking for me? Who do you want me to cut?

story.en: Originally born into a tailor family on the planet Rekos, she was raised by mercenaries after losing her parents in a civil war, and became a wandering swordswoman. Until she met Straze, the Black Knight, and her life changed forever.

description.en: Mercenary of Rekos who wanted to be a tailor
Strikes and slices the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.
Brutally cuts the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict four bleeding effects for 2 turns, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

enhanced_description.en: Brutally cuts the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict four bleeding effects for 2 turns, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Damage dealt increases when the target isn't buffed.

description.en: Slashes the enemy with Cho & Mal, inflicting extinction when the enemy is defeated. Grants the caster skill nullifier once, negating damage received from the next skill attack. Hit Chance is increased by 20% when using this skill.

get_line.en: I will protect everyone!

story.en: A young queen who is strong and full of kindness. She leads her people with a mature, wise demeanor. The people of Solayu previously had complaints about the Lady of La Mare, but their feelings are slowly being changed by their lady's changed behavior.

description.en: An elegant young queen who showed up to protect her land
Attacks with a giant sword before granting the caster immunity for 1 turn.

Decreases damage suffered from a critical hit by 30%. Decreases damage suffered from a critical hit for all allies except for the caster by {{variable}}. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. At the moment the caster suffers a critical hit, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%.

Smashes the enemy with a sword and attacks. Penetrates the target's Defense by 50%. When the target is a Dark elemental Hero, increases damage dealt and inflicts additional damage proportional to the caster's Attack to all enemies except for the target.

enhanced_description.en: Smashes the enemy with a sword and attacks, recovering Health proportional to damage dealt. Penetrates the target's Defense by 50%. When the target is a Dark elemental Hero, increases damage dealt and inflicts additional damage proportional to the caster's Attack to all enemies except for the target.

get_line.en: Please, call me Lorina.

story.en: An apprentice of the Order of the Shield, Lorina is constantly practicing to achieve her goal of becoming a knight. She thinks she's clever and confident, but in reality she's quite naive and easily tricked by others.

description.en: She may look skilled, but she's useless! An Order of the Shield apprentice
Knocks the enemy into the air with a spear.

enhanced_description.en: Knocks the enemy into the air with a spear, increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 20%.

description.en: Increases Attack by {{variable}} each time the caster attacks an enemy. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.
Jumps into the air and strikes down at the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

get_line.en: I'm Lots, I'll do whatever you need.

story.en: Originally a part of the Order of the Blue Cross, Lots was dispatched to Reingar, where he studied healing magic. Wanting to test his abilities and find a rare magical item, he has left on a journey.

description.en: A valiant healer searching for a rare magical item
Attacks with a light sphere, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn.

Uses healing magic to recover Health and increase Combat Readiness by {{variable}} of ally, before increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 30%. Amount recovered is proportional to the ally's max Health.
Uses strengthening magic to recover Health, increase Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, and grant continuous healing for 2 turns to all allies.

enhanced_description.en: Uses strengthening magic to recover Health, increase Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, and grant continuous healing for 3 turns to all allies.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 2 turns.

get_line.en: Hi! I'm Lucy, the newest member of the Student Council. Just let me know if there's anything I can do to help!

story.en: A new member of the Student Council, Lucy was recruited to assist Hazel, who has grown tired of her excessive workload and all the preparations she must carry out for various events. Initially, Lucy was only helping out with paperwork, but thanks to the scheming of Yuna and Carrot, she was also selected as an ambassador for the Student Council. She also works as a recordkeeper in the Archive Management Department.

description.en: The Student Council's newest mascot who loves recordkeeping
Throws paper to attack the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to restrict for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to restrict and decrease Speed for 2 turns.
Uses many sheets of paper to grant a barrier to all allies for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Uses many sheets of paper to grant a barrier to all allies for 2 turns before decreasing debuff durations by 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Fine. I am Ludwig, the final Nocturne.

story.en: Ludwig is the sole survivor of the Nocturnes, the family responsible for protecting the Lunar Cemetery. He cherishes the Guardian Kromcruz more than anyone else. Though he might look young, he is well along in years.

description.en: The sole survivor of the Nocturnes
Attacks with magic, before a {{variable}} chance to steal one buff. Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 15% when the caster is buffed after attacking.
Attacks with light, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn before granting the caster invincibility for 1 turn.

Attacks all enemies with Nocturne magic, penetrating Defense by 20%. When the caster is invincible, penetrates Defense by an additional 10%. A critical hit will grant the caster a barrier for 2 turns, with strength increasing proportional to the caster's Attack.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with Nocturne magic, penetrating Defense by 20%. When the caster is invincible, penetrates Defense by an additional 30%. A critical hit will grant the caster a barrier for 2 turns, with strength increasing proportional to the caster's Attack.

get_line.en: I'm Luluca! Unrivaled throughout the universe!

story.en: An Alien girl who traveled across the universe seeking revenge against Straze for bringing ruin to her world. She's determined to make Straze pay for what he has done to her friends and restore her homeworld.

description.en: A shaman of Rekos who crossed the universe for revenge
Attacks with intense elemental force, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.
With the blessing of the stars, grants increased Defense and barrier to all allies for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

soul_description.en: All skill cooldowns decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with the power of ruin, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with the power of ruin, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, before increasing the caster's Attack. Increased Attack can stack up to 3 times.

get_line.en: My destiny, my loyalty, my horns... I offer them all to you.

story.en: Luna is a half-Dragon, half-Human knight that has been loyal to Wintenberg since the time of Queen Francesca. Only a few know of the true feelings hidden behind her smile.

description.en: Half-Dragon of Wintenberg seeking vengeance
Stabs the target a random number of times. Skill cooldown decreases by 1-3 turns and damage dealt increases according to the number of attacks.

Increases Attack and Critical Hit Chance by {{variable}} when the caster's Health is 50% or more, and increases Defense and decreases chance of suffering a critical hit by {{variable}} when the caster's Health is less than 50%.
Soars into the air and hits the enemy with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Soars into the air and hits the enemy with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Attacks using an advantageous element.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c4044_gacha_get)

story.en: After resolving a problem in a Taranor laboratory, Doris became a magic scholar to continue her father's research. Although she's completely buried in work, she's content now that she's found her life's purpose.

description.en: A curious girl continuing her family's research
Attacks with light energy, before a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

Recites the Celebration of Light, recovering the Health of all allies and granting continuous healing and increased Defense for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Dispels one debuff from an ally with light magic, before recovering their Health and increasing their Combat Readiness by 35%. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Dispels one debuff from an ally with light magic, before recovering their Health and increasing their Combat Readiness by 50%. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

get_line.en: Hi, hi! I'm this maid cafe's queen, Chloe!

story.en: "You could be the queen of our store!" -- Enticed by such a suggestion, Chloe began working in a maid café, but with no idea what kind of work a maid is expected to do, she lacks a certain care for her customers.

description.en: Clueless Queen of a maid cafe
Attacks with a hammer, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn. When the target is stunned after the attack, increases Combat Readiness of all allies except for the caster by 15%.

Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 20%. At the start of the turn, recovers Health of the two allies with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Entertains all allies with VIP Treatment, reviving all dead allies to 20% Health. Dispels two debuffs from all living allies and grants revive for 3 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Entertains all allies with VIP Treatment, reviving all dead allies to 20% Health. Dispels two debuffs from all living allies and grants revive for 3 turns, before increasing Attack of all allies for 3 turns.

get_line.en: I'll teach you how strong I am.

story.en: In his goal of becoming the strongest in the universe, he is hunting down and challenging every martial arts master he can find. He will cross time and space, and even dimensions, to find a worthy challenger.

description.en: A boy heading for greatness
Batters the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn.

Has a 30% chance to counterattack when attacked, with a 100% chance to counterattack with Dragon Flame after suffering a critical hit.
Dragon Flame (Acquire 1 Soul): Makes a critical hit, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health. This attack receives effects that are applied to the basic skill.
Attacks all enemies with a powerful ground pound, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with a powerful ground pound, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and increase Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c4041_gacha_get)

story.en: Hazel disguised herself to recruit more members for the student council. Only a few know her true identity, and once she's finished with her business, she returns to her original appearance.

description.en: A pretty girl with stunning beauty
Attacks with fire magic, with a {{variable}} chance to make unhealable for 2 turns.

Heals the target proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%. Amount recovered is doubled when the target's Health is 50% or less.

Encourages allies by increasing Attack of the target and all other allies for 1 turn, before recovering Health of all allies and dispelling one debuff. When the target is a Fire elemental Hero, grants the target increased Attack (Greater) instead. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health and the caster's Attack.

enhanced_description.en: Encourages allies by increasing Attack of the target and all other allies for 2 turns, before recovering Health of all allies and dispelling one debuff. When the target is a Fire elemental Hero, grants the target increased Attack (Greater) instead. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health and the caster's Attack.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Oh, you were looking for me? Thank you!

story.en: An apprentice knight of the Order of the Shield, Maya boasts incredible arm strength. Finding great value in her work protecting people, she devoted herself to the Order of the Shield. She cares greatly for her family back home.

description.en: A young knight with a strong arm and shield
Attacks with a blunt weapon, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Attacks with a shield, with a {{variable}} chance each to stun for 1 turn before decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Has a {{variable}} chance to provoke all enemies for 1 turn, before a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Increases Defense of the caster for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Has a {{variable}} chance to provoke all enemies for 1 turn, before a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Increases Defense of all allies for 2 turns.

get_line.en: This path... This is the fate I choose.

story.en: Mediator Kawerik roams Cidonia restoring the destroyed balance of the land's Spirits. He may have passively accepted his fate for the time being, but deep down, he hopes that he'll one day return to his ordinary life with the person he loves.

description.en: A lone wanderer who sacrificed his own life

Dashes toward the enemy to attack, increasing Combat Readiness of the ally except for the caster with the highest Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

Attacks the enemy with the mediator's power, decreasing Attack for 2 turns and granting a barrier to all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Barrier strength increases proportional to the ally's max Health.
Restores balance that has been destroyed, dispelling all debuffs from all allies and increasing Attack for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Restores balance that has been destroyed, dispelling all debuffs from all allies and granting increased Attack and immunity for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Will you join me on my quest for vengeance? For the revival of the Bloodrose family.

story.en: A Vampire who dreams of revenge after losing everything. Originally the eldest daughter of a noble family, she fell in love with a Vampire she met at a ball and soon became a Vampire herself. After a long separation following an ambush, she was enraged to discover her love had betrayed her. Though he had since died, that won't stop her exacting her revenge on his son.

description.en: A Vampire betrayed by her lover, crossing the ocean to take her revenge
Overpowers the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to make them unhealable for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.
Attacks by unleashing their inner rage, before granting immortality to the caster for 1 turn. This skill's cooldown is reset when the enemy is defeated.

Dispels all buffs from the enemy before attacking by releasing their pent-up aggression, cursing for 2 turns. This skill is unaffected by elemental disadvantage. Elite or Boss monsters cannot be cursed.

enhanced_description.en: Dispels all buffs from the enemy before attacking by releasing their pent-up aggression, cursing for 2 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn. This skill is unaffected by elemental disadvantage. Elite or Boss monsters cannot be cursed.

get_line.en: If that is your will, I will obey.

story.en: A Homunculus placed in the care of Queen Diene some years previously, Mercedes has a poker face that gives away little emotion, but she grows quickly attached to those who show her kindness. Sometimes, she may awkwardly mimic others or repeat what they say.

description.en: A blank-faced Homunculus chosen by The Last Spellbook
Attacks two enemies with shock magic.

Attacks all enemies with a massive light sphere. If used when there are three or fewer enemies, activates Dimensional Rupture again, and damage dealt increases as enemies become fewer. When activated this way, Dimensional Rupture deals decreased damage, and can only be activated once.
Releases the power of the Ancient Book to attack all enemies, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's lost Health.

enhanced_description.en: Releases the power of the Ancient Book to strongly attack all enemies, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's lost Health.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c4023_gacha_get)

story.en: Initially skeptical of Gunther's kindness, Helga eventually came to realize his sincerity. At his suggestion, she joins his mercenary company, but is flustered to learn she is the only member.

description.en: An unruly mercenary trusting in justice
Attacks the enemy with an axe, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will have a 50% chance to extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.

description.en: Encourages all allies, increasing Attack and Effectiveness of all allies for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: The desert taught me that nothing is forever and nothing truly disappears.

story.en: A mercenary and adventurer constantly going back and forth between Savara and the Great Desert, Mirsa's main business is treasure hunting. A child of nomads, she has no fixed home. Finding old ruins in the desert is one of her favorite things.

description.en: A cool treasure hunter shining within a sandstorm
Attacks with dual-wielded swords, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Increases Evasion Chance by {{variable}}. At the moment the caster is attacked, if the caster successfully evades, decreases cooldown of the caster by 1 turn and increases Speed for 2 turns.
Ambushes the target, silencing them for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's Speed.

enhanced_description.en: Ambushes the target, silencing them for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's Speed.

get_line.en: I'm... always sad.

story.en: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. She sings songs of a passion frozen by painful betrayal. She is known to mercilessly tear things apart with her bare hands.

description.en: A cold-blooded Banshee with an ice-cold scream
Claws the enemy, absorbing some of the damage to heal all allies.
Casts a spell at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them unhealable and decrease Attack for 2 turns.
Attacks by absorbing the enemy's life force. Some of the damage dealt is absorbed to heal all allies.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks by absorbing the enemy's life force. Some of the damage dealt is absorbed to heal all allies. When the enemy is defeated, grants revive for 2 turns to the ally with the lowest Health.

get_line.en: It's me, Montmorancy! It'll all work out... eventually! Yes!

story.en: An apprentice sister of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, Montmorancy is an understudy of Achates and Clarissa, the latter of which she likes very much. She is naive and often makes mistakes, but overcomes them with a positive attitude.

description.en: A naive and hardworking apprentice nun
Attacks the enemy with water energy, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn.
Dispels one debuff from all allies, and heals debuffed allies. Amount recovered is proportional to the ally's max Health.
Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns, while increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Effect is granted to all allies.

get_line.en: *chuckling* Welcome, distinguished guest. It is I, the great Mortelix. But you, you can call me Mort.

story.en: An ancient Dragon who always carries an air of gentility and relaxation that belies his capricious and egotistical nature. Tired of his dull life, he wants nothing more than to find an adversary worthy of calling a rival. Likewise, he tends to grow obsessed anytime he encounters someone he finds interesting.

description.en:
An ancient Dragon
in search of a worthy rival
Pierces the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Ignores Effect Resistance when the caster is enraged.

enhanced_description.en: Pierces the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Ignores Effect Resistance when the caster is enraged. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

description.en:
Immune to stun and sleep. If the caster inflicts a critical hit when using a basic skill, has a {{variable}} chance to activate Sacred Blessing. Can be activated once every 2 turns.
Sacred Blessing: Increases Critical Hit Resistance of all allies for 1 turn and increases Speed of the caster for 2 turns.

Descends and attacks all enemies, inflicting injuries. The caster becomes enraged for 2 turns and recovers Health. Damage dealt and amount recovered increase proportional to the caster's max Health. The severity of injuries increases proportional to damage dealt. Injuries decrease max Health of the target by up to 15% every time this skill is used.

get_line.en: Right or wrong, I'll worry about that later!

story.en: Living carefree as the leader of a group of thieves, Mucacha turned over a new leaf after meeting Cecilia and began an honest life as a follower of Corvus. He cherishes loyalty.

description.en: A reformed thief, descended from Angara
Attacks with a spear, increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}}. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Increases Speed by {{variable}} each time the caster attacks an enemy. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.
Attacks with a fatal blow, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with a fatal blow, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, before increasing Speed of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

get_line.en: So, you wanted to see me?

story.en: A former circus trainer talented at taming ferocious monsters. Unsatisfied with the small world of the circus and believing in her ability to tame anything, she quit and now dreams of a comfortable life as an object of worship.

description.en: A monster tamer dreaming of her very own paradise
Attacks with a whip, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict a random debuff for 1 turn.

soul_description.en: Increases effect chance to 100% and inflicts a random debuff for 2 turns.

description.en: Calls upon a tamed monster to attack all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two bleeding effects for 2 turns, and a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.
Drives monsters forward to attack all enemies, dispelling two buffs.

enhanced_description.en: Drives monsters forward to attack all enemies, dispelling two buffs. Grants increased Attack to all allies for 3 turns.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c4062_gacha_get)

story.en: A singer-songwriter who also serves as vocalist, instrumentalist, songwriter, and producer for the duo Maid Kingdom. She's wearing a maid costume for the sake of the band's image, but she doesn't know much about maids, so she feels a little awkward.

description.en: A genius musician who serenades with her soul
Attacks with a quick shot of an arrow. A critical hit will decrease the caster's skill cooldown by 1 turn.
Shoots an arrow infused with a sleep toxin, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn.
Encourages an ally except for the caster, decreasing skill cooldowns by 2 turns and increasing Attack for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Encourages an ally except for the caster, decreasing skill cooldowns by 3 turns and increasing Attack for 2 turns.

get_line.en: I'm... Nemunas Winka... Oh, well, right here is where I am!

story.en: Her nickname is Nemu. As a child, Nemunas was saved from the Dragon Valley by the Queen of Wintenberg and her Dragon Knights. At this point, she decided she must become a Dragon Knight. She left her home to participate in the Wintenberg Tournament to become a Dragon Knight.

description.en: An archer of the Winka family longing to become a Dragon Knight
Decreases enemy's Combat Readiness by {{variable}} after attacking them.
Powerfully shoots an arrow at the enemy, decreasing Hit Chance for 2 turns and Combat Readiness by 30%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the enemy's max Health.
Encourages all allies, dispelling one debuff.

enhanced_description.en: Encourages all allies, dispelling one debuff, and increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Operator Sigret. At your service.

story.en: An Android created by the Homunculus rebel organization using forbidden Lost Technology. Though she was created to destroy the world, in the process of seizing her from the enemies, Krau was registered in her system as an administrator, and as a result, Operator Sigret was assigned to Special Force Team 7. At first she was merely a machine with no emotions, but as she embarks on more missions with Krau, she's beginning to develop her own personality.

description.en: An Android with a mysterious power who is beginning to understand Humans
Attacks the enemy with a scythe, before healing the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
Batters the enemy with a scythe. Grants an extra turn when the enemy is defeated. Penetrates the target's Defense by 50%, or by 100% when the target is granted a barrier.
Calls in drones to attack all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease buff durations by 1 turn. Increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Calls in drones to attack all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease buff durations by 1 turn before decreasing Combat Readiness by 20%. Increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: I'll help you as best I can.

story.en: Having escaped the Homunculus experiments in the Laboratory, Otillie went to Wetheric Moor, following her cloudy memory of the past. Her blank facial expression and lack of Human emotion makes it very hard to tell if she is lying. She is quick-witted with good conversational skills.

description.en: An escaped Homunculus and bold-faced liar
Attacks with dark energy, with a {{variable}} chance to make the enemy unhealable for 2 turns.
All allies receive {{variable}} less damage from attacks that target all allies. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
Exhales powerful darkness to attack the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, before silencing for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Exhales powerful darkness to attack the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, before silencing and making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: I'm Pavel, of the Perland Raiders.

story.en: A young member of the Perland Raiders. As the son of pathfinders through ancient ruins, Pavel inherited an exceptional talent for tracking and navigation. He is incredibly loyal to Perland, the largest city in Cidonia, for providing his previously nomadic family with safety, and is frequently trusted with important missions for the Raiders.

description.en: A patroller carrying the fate of Cidonia on his shoulders
Strikes the enemy with a gun, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Fires a strong blast of wind at all enemies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

enhanced_description.en: Grants the caster increased Attack for 2 turns, before firing a strong blast of wind at all enemies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

description.en: Swiftly cuts and shoots the enemy. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, damage sharing effects are ignored. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

get_line.en: Nice to meet you.

story.en: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. She sing songs of malice that flow slowly like dust. She is known to strangle opponent with a gentle and friendly face.

description.en: A quiet Banshee who strangles her enemies slowly
Claws the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 10% per sleep debuff inflicted.
Attacks the enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. When the enemy is asleep, deals additional damage equivalent to 10% of the target's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. When the enemy is asleep, deals additional damage equivalent to 20% of the target's max Health.

get_line.en: Tell me, what do you need? A friend, a lover, family? I can make you anything you want... I guarantee it will be better than having a Human around...

story.en: The last survivor of a planet that vanished at the hands of Fastus. As an exceptional Automatic Doll maker, she is determined to ensure her civilization lives on in a city that lasts forever.

description.en: A planet's last survivor and the founder of Politia
Summons dolls to attack the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.

When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, reduces the effect of Combat Readiness increases granted to the enemy by 50%. This effect does not stack with other passive effects of the same name. Activates Tranquility when an enemy uses a non-attack skill. Tranquility can only be activated once every 2 turns.
Tranquility: Attacks all enemies, decreasing buff durations by 1 turn, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 30%.
Attacks all enemies with alien technology, with a {{variable}} chance to make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with alien technology, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Hit Chance and make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Hmph, I only trust what I can see. What kind of fool believes in justice?

story.en: Believing life is all about hitting a jackpot, Purrgis loves to snoop around. Born in Farche, a poor region, he has suffered discrimination for many years, turning him into an opportunist obsessed with money.

description.en: A sly mercenary dreaming of a jackpot

Mows down the enemy with a great sword, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Speed for 2 turns and decrease Combat Readiness by 20%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

When attacked, has a {{variable}} chance to counterattack. Counterattacks with Get Lost!.
Get Lost! (Acquire 1 Soul): Attacks all enemies with a great sword. Inflicts the same debuffs as Falling Strike, before a 15% chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. This attack receives effects that are applied to the basic skill.

Attacks all enemies with a powerful ground pound, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn. Has a 70% chance to stun for 1 turn when the target's Health is 30% or less. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with a powerful ground pound, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn. Has a 100% chance to stun for 1 turn when the target's Health is 30% or less. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: I live to follow orders... Will that be enough?

story.en: Part of the Church of Ilryos, Pyllis was originally Human before the Homunculus experiments changed her. She cannot remember anything from her time as a Human, but has a lingering feeling of being abandoned by a friend.

description.en: A lonely Homunculus with missing memories
Attacks the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

At the moment the caster is attacked, increases Defense of the caster. At the moment of every fourth attack suffered, increases Defense of all allies for 2 turns. The caster's increased Defense can stack up to 3 times.
Attacks the enemy before provoking for 1 turn, and grants a barrier to the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt and barrier strength increase proportional to the caster's Defense.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy before provoking for 1 turn, and grants a barrier to all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt and barrier strength increase proportional to the caster's Defense.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: I'll do my duty today, too!

story.en: Created to protect the world and all life within it, he is admired as the leader of the Heirs and the alter ego of the Goddess. He has a good personality and is very understanding, though he lacks some understanding of Humans.

description.en: Heir of the Covenant, a defender of the world
Attacks with a sword, dealing damage proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with a sword, with 75% chance to dispel a buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

description.en: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, before triggering a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Strongly attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, before recovering the caster's Health and increasing Defense of the caster for 2 turns. Amount recovered and damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: I'll give you an unending nightmare. See it as an honor.

story.en: Ravi once was a quiet girl living in a countryside, until she fell into a victim of the Homunculus experiments and became a Wraith. Since Ravi was made by the power of Tenebria, she strongly believes she is the chosen one.

description.en: The aggressive little girl reborn as a Wraith
Attacks the enemy with a double-edged axe, with a 35% chance to --stun-- for 1 turn, before recovering Health proportional to damage dealt.

soul_description.en: Greatly increases amount of damage dealt. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.

description.en: Starts the fight with 40 **Fighting Spirit**. Increases the caster's Attack and Effectiveness by 15% when they attack or are attacked. This effect can only stack up to 5 times. At the moment the caster is attacked, **increases Combat Readiness** by {{variable}} and gains 5 **Fighting Spirit**.
Brutally attacks **all enemies**, with a 75% chance to --stun-- for 1 turn. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%.

enhanced_description.en: Brutally attacks **all enemies**, with a 75% chance to --stun-- for 1 turn, **decreasing Combat Readiness** of stunned enemies by 100%. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%.

description.en: When Ravi was reborn as a wraith, fire energy was infused into her body, deriving its strength from the lives taken by her axe.
Has a 40% chance to **dispel one debuff** from the caster when using Slaughter.

skill_description.en: Attacks the enemy with a double-edged axe, with a 35% chance to --stun-- for 1 turn, before recovering Health proportional to damage dealt, with a 40% chance to **dispel one debuff** from the caster when using Slaughter.

description.en: Has a 70% chance to make the target --unable to be buffed-- for 1 turn when using Slaughter.

skill_description.en: Attacks the enemy with a double-edged axe, with a 35% chance to --stun-- for 1 turn and a 70% chance to make them --unable to be buffed-- for 1 turn, before recovering Health proportional to damage dealt.

description.en: Increase Devil Drive's chance to --stun-- by 10%.

skill_description.en: Brutally attacks **all enemies**, with a 85% chance to --stun-- for 1 turn, **decreasing Combat Readiness** of stunned enemies by 100%. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%.

get_line.en: Do you have any patients for me? Hmm... You don't look so well yourself.

story.en: A young nobleman who joined the army after an argument with his father, who believes that medical treatment should only be provided to nobles who can pay. Ray dreams of a world in which those who are less fortunate can receive the medical treatment they need.

description.en: An Aakhen military doctor who dreams of reformation
Attacks by throwing a bottle, dispelling one debuff from an ally.
Radiates light upon all allies, granting a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the ally's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Radiates light upon all allies, recovering Health and granting a barrier for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength increase proportional to the ally's max Health.

description.en: Invigorates the team by dispelling all debuffs inflicted on all allies, and grants immunity for 2 turns before recovering Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the ally's max Health.

get_line.en: I'll decide for myself whether or not you will be useful.

story.en: Remnant Violet succeeded in reviving the fortunes of his family after becoming its head, but developed a deep disillusionment with the nobles and citizenry of Perland through years of war. Eventually, he helped Lilias become queen and led the purge of her opponents. He later became the loyal captain of her Queen's Guard and is now the second most powerful person in Perland.

description.en: A cold-blooded military man forging a new order
Cuts the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

At the end of the caster's turn, has a {{variable}} chance to increase Evasion of the caster for 1 turn. After successfully evading, gains 1 Focus. When Focus is at 5 after being attacked, consumes it all and uses Massacre against a random enemy.

enhanced_description.en: At the start of battle and at the end of the caster's turn, has a {{variable}} chance to increase Evasion of the caster for 1 turn. After successfully evading, gains 1 Focus. When Focus is at 5 after being attacked, consumes it all and uses Massacre against a random enemy.

description.en: Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns, before attacking with a sword. Penetrates Defense by 50%.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: What do you want from me?

story.en: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. She sings a bizarrely pleasant song of brutal murder and mourning. Her funeral dirge is for the enemy she is about to kill.

description.en: A crazed Banshee dancing to a funeral dirge
Claws the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn.

All allies absorb {{variable}} of the damage they each inflict as Health. Every time an enemy dies, all allies recover 20% Health and the caster's Combat Readiness increases by 10%. Effects upon enemy death can only be activated once per turn.
Attacks with magic, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with magic, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 20%.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c4051_gacha_get)

story.en: Carrot studied tirelessly to pass the notorious Magic Research Department exam and became a professional researcher. She thought things would finally get better once she passed, but instead, she feels like she has gotten even busier.

description.en: A thorough researcher, seeking the truth behind magic
Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns, before detonating burn effects inflicted on the enemy at the end of the turn.

At the moment the caster is attacked, grants the caster a barrier for 1 turn and burns the attacker for 1 turn. Barrier effect can only be activated once per turn, and barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
Attacks all enemies with powerful fire, dispelling one buff before a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two burn effects for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with powerful fire, dispelling one buff before a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c4013_gacha_get)

story.en: After learning about wicked merchants from Savara bamboozling the Suin, Roozid resolves to restore the riches illicitly taken from them. He goes through intensive training and finally emerges anew.

description.en: A righteous thief who fights for those in need
Cuts the enemy with dual-wielded swords, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Attacks with a swordstorm, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Increases Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}} and grants the caster continuous heal for 2 turns through the power of the moon.

enhanced_description.en: All allies are granted increased Speed for 2 turns and have Combat Readiness increased by {{variable}} through the power of the moon. Also grants the caster continuous heal for 2 turns.

get_line.en: The spear is my passion, my specialty, my life. Hmm, if there's anything you need, feel free to ask haha!

story.en: A founding member of the Spear Club, Rikoris got caught up with Azalea and began helping out with the Public Security Club. He often lacks common sense, and is weak to the requests of others.

description.en: A kind, weak-hearted member of the Spear Club
Attacks with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. When the caster is granted increased Speed, effect chance increases by 25%.
Encourages all allies, increasing Speed for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Encourages all allies, decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn and increasing Speed for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with a shockwave, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff.

get_line.en: You finally called for me? Thank you!

story.en: An energetic and cheerful girl, Rima is a master archer who spends her time as a wandering minstrel. Otherwise fearless and daring, she is terrified of mice.

description.en: A wandering minstrel with a talent for the bow
Attacks with a quick shot of an arrow. A critical hit will decrease the caster's skill cooldown by 1 turn.
Shoots an arrow infused with a sleep toxin, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn.
Encourages an ally except for the caster, decreasing skill cooldowns by 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Encourages an ally except for the caster, decreasing skill cooldowns by 3 turns.

get_line.en: Hey! Call me Rin.

story.en: A brave and sturdy young girl, Rin was adopted by the great merchant Basar following the loss of her father, though she refuses to believe he is truly dead. She is full of ambition, but also good-natured with a strong sense of justice.

description.en: A brave and stubborn young merchant girl
Throws rings at the enemy, with a 75% chance to dispel one buff, and increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 15%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Dazzles the enemy with a dance, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, before a 50% chance to use Ring Throw. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Heals all allies with an elegant dance, granting one random buff for 3 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Heals all allies with an elegant dance, granting two random buffs for 3 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: If rooting out evil is what warriors do, I'm already a warrior!

story.en: Born to a family of scholars, he dreamed of becoming a warrior from a young age. After his parents disappeared following a raid by the Axe Bandits, he pledged to become stronger and get his revenge. Believing that reforming the rotten world is the only way to become a true warrior, he roams around the world defeating evil.

description.en: A warrior roaming the world to eradicate evil
Attacks with a slingshot, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with a slingshot, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Damage dealt is increased when the enemy is debuffed.

description.en: Fires a shockbomb at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to increase skill cooldown by 1 turn. Decreases skill cooldown of Go, Racoo! by 1 turn. At the end of the turn, detonates bombs inflicted on the enemy.
Attacks all enemies with Racoo, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Speed and plant a bomb for 2 turns.

get_line.en: I see the source of your radiant light...

story.en: A shaman of Rekos and Luluca's friend. Born with the Vigilant Eye, she is able to perceive the true nature of other beings. She visited Straze to confess her feelings for him, but in a tragic twist of fate, she was killed at his hand.

description.en: A tragic shaman who sees others' true natures
Attacks the enemy with a noble power, granting a barrier to the ally with the lowest Health for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Grants a barrier to all allies for 2 turns after attacking.

description.en: Recovers Health of all allies when an ally is attacked by an extra attack, counterattack, or Dual Attack, and increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 5% each per attacked ally. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's max Health and the number of attacked allies.
With the grace of Rekos, grants revive to all allies for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: With the grace of Rekos, recovers the Health of all allies and grants revive for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster’s max Health.

get_line.en: Pleased to meet you.

story.en: Knight Commander of Lefundos, situated in Eureka the Northern Continent. Romann has no desire to be king despite being the cousin and successor of the current king, Schniel. Cynical and assertive, yet weak to affection.

description.en: Knight Commander of Lefundos, a sharp-tongued cynic
Shoots gravity arrows at the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, and increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}}.
Attacks all enemies with a magic circle, with a 50% chance each to decrease Combat Readiness by {{variable}} four times.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Shoots a powerful gravity sphere at all enemies, dispelling all buffs and increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 50%. Damage dealt increases when the enemy is buffed.

enhanced_description.en: Shoots a powerful gravity sphere at all enemies, dispelling all buffs and increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 50%. When the enemy is buffed, damage dealt increases and the enemy is inflicted with two poison effects for 2 turns, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by an additional 30%.

get_line.en: Though I may be lacking, I will do my best!

story.en: A quiet and kind young canine Suin of the Itan Clan, despite struggling to feed even himself, Roozid makes sure the sandcats of the Great Desert do not starve either. He admires Cartuja greatly.

description.en: A kind warrior of the Itan Clan who takes care of the sandcats
Cuts the enemy with dual-wielded swords, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Attacks with a swordstorm, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Corrects stance, increasing Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}}.

enhanced_description.en: Corrects stance, increasing Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}} and increasing their Speed for 2 turns.
