get_line.en: So? I'm confident I can take you down. Do you want to spar with me?

story.en: A close aide of Cecilia's, Rose followed her all the way from Wintenberg. She loves to fight and has a good sense of humor. Her belief is that the strongest warrior die with no regrets.

description.en: Winning is the only way to survive! A warlike protector

Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn when the caster's Health is 50% or more, and increases Defense of the caster for 1 turn when the caster's Health is less than 50%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

Covers an ally with the Shield of Light, dispelling two debuffs and granting a barrier for 2 turns before increasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Defense.
Gives blessing to all allies, increasing Attack for 1 turn, and Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.

enhanced_description.en: Gives blessing to all allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns, and Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Grants increased Defense to the caster for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Well, I'll do my best. I really will!

story.en: An Heir of the Sixth World, Ruele is revered for her kindness. She is a Soul Weaver who gained the favor of the Lord of Light, Destina. Her only hobby is telling fortunes with rabbit fortune cookies.

description.en: A gentle saint shining with blessed light

Attacks the enemy with a staff before healing the ally with the lowest Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health, and amount recovered increases proportional to the ally's max Health.

soul_description.en: Attacks the enemy before greatly healing all allies. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.

description.en: Summons a light pillar, dispelling all debuffs from an ally before recovering their Health and granting them a barrier for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength increase proportional to the caster's max Health.

Revives one dead ally with healing magic, recovering 50% of their Health before granting them invincibility for 1 turn. When this skill is used on a living ally, all of the ally's debuffs will be dispelled before the same effect is applied.

enhanced_description.en: Revives one dead ally with healing magic, recovering all of their Health before granting them invincibility for 1 turn. When this skill is used on a living ally, all of the ally's debuffs will be dispelled before the same effect is applied.

get_line.en: Great to meet you. I'm Baal Chanel, and this is my fiancée, Sezan Serzan.

story.en: Sage Baal fell in love with an ordinary Human named Sezan and locked her soul in a doll to preserve her for himself forever. However, as time passed her soul eroded away, and eventually, she became simply a normal doll.

description.en: An otherworldly romantic with all kinds of knowledge

Summons an evil spirit to attack the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to put the enemy to sleep for 1 turn. When the target is asleep after the attack, increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 20%. This skill does not trigger a Dual Attack.

Attacks all enemies by summoning storm clouds, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff and a {{variable}} chance to put them to sleep. When this skill is available, increases the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}} at the end of the enemy's turn.

Attacks with evil eyes. When the enemy is defeated, silences all remaining enemies for 1 turn. Penetrates Defense, but cannot trigger a critical hit. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with evil eyes. When the enemy is defeated, silences all remaining enemies for 1 turn, before recovering the caster to max Health. Penetrates Defense, but cannot trigger a critical hit. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

soul_description.en: All skill cooldowns decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: Shall I play with you since you summoned me?

story.en: A master of gunpowder weaponry, Schuri has a strong sense of pride and arrogance, though suffers a complex about his weak physical strength.

description.en: Brimming with confidence, it's the Explosive Gentleman
Attack the enemy with a pistol, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict poison for 2 turns.
After delivering a critical hit, the caster gains 1 Focus, and the Combat Readiness of all allies except the caster is increased by {{variable}}.
Shoots all enemies with a rifle. When the caster's stacked Focus is 3 or more, this skill is enhanced into Full Burst. A successful attack with Full Burst always results in a critical hit.

enhanced_description.en: Shoots all enemies with a rifle. When the caster's stacked Focus is 3 or more, this skill is enhanced into Full Burst. A successful attack with Full Burst always results in a critical hit, decreasing Combat Readiness of all enemies by 30%.

get_line.en: Sometimes it's important to get some rest. Only then can you be at the top of your game.

story.en: Bellona has come to Reingar to help Karin and the Public Security Club cope with the influx of summer visitors. Although she claims she's here to watch over Sez, it seems her true goal is to relax in the resort.

description.en: Ace of the Phantom CIC, brighter than the sun
Attacks the enemy with a fan, with a {{variable}} chance to target the enemy for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy with a fan, with a {{variable}} chance to target the enemy for 2 turns.

description.en:
Shares 30% of damage suffered by the caster with the foremost ally. When more than one damage sharing effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. The caster gains 1 Focus when an ally is attacked. When an ally is attacked and the caster's stacked Focus is 5, loses all Focus and activates You're Not Cute.
You're Not Cute: Attacks all enemies with a fan, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies with a spray of water, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them unable to be buffed and unhealable for 2 turns. A critical hit will increase damage dealt.

get_line.en: Nice to meet you! I'm Senya. I've still got a lot to learn. I hope you'll lead me in the right direction!

story.en: Long ago, there was a little girl who lived in a small village in Wintenberg. After losing everything to a Dragon's attack, she swore she would get vengeance. Mort promised he would give her the power to achieve this, and under Mort's guidance, she learned how to kill Dragons.

description.en: The first person to kill a Dragon and first Dragon Knight
Attacks the enemy with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn. When it is not the caster's turn, effect chance increases by 25%.

The caster cannot trigger a critical hit, but Attack increases by 30% and Critical Hit Resistance increases by {{variable}}. When attacked, if the caster suffers a non-critical hit, deals damage to the attacker proportional to the caster's Attack before activating Grace of the Battlefield. Grace of the Battlefield can only be activated once every 2 turns.
Grace of the Battlefield: Grants a random buff to all allies for 1 turn.
Strikes all enemies with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Strikes all enemies with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns. Adopts a counterattacking stance for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: Oh my, you were looking for me?

story.en: With her glamorous beauty and enchanting smile, she's the quintessential witch. She loves money, especially when using it to decorate herself with beautiful things. She doesn't go anywhere without her magical weapon, Chatty.

description.en: A glamorous witch who loves beautiful things
Attacks with a flame of seduction, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Absorbs the enemy's Attack, increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack of the enemy for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Absorbs the enemy's Attack, increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns before recovering Health proportional to the damage dealt, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack of the enemy for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, cooldown does not increase.

description.en: Swallows the enemy in the flame of Chatty, the magic lantern, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns.

get_line.en: What do you want from me...?

story.en: A cynical and quiet man, Sez Gaien is a living weapon known to many as "the Berserker." After gaining power from an Acolyte to escape the Homunculus experiments, he was branded a mass murderer and has been running ever since.

description.en: A living weapon, the cynical Berserker
Penetrates the enemy with dark energy, with a 50% chance to make them unhealable for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

enhanced_description.en: Penetrates the enemy with dark energy, making the enemy unhealable for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

description.en:
When the enemy's Health is 50% or less after attacking with Dark Shadow, activates Encroach. Encroach can only be activated once per turn of the caster.
Encroach (Acquire 1 Soul): Releases dark power to attack all enemies, with a 50% chance to make them unhealable for 1 turn.
Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the enemy's lost Health. When the enemy dies, inflicts additional damage to all enemies proportional to the caster's Attack.

get_line.en: Roseria Dart has been called to arms.

story.en: Rose was ready and willing to follow Cecilia anywhere, until she had her heart completely shattered. Now she is an obsessive and fiercely persistent war machine.

description.en: A protector walking the path of blood as a shadow of a precious thing

Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 1 turn when the target's Health is 50% or more, and a {{variable}} chance to make them unhealable for 1 turn when the target's Health is less than 50%.
Leaps into the air and strikes at the enemy with a swordstorm, dispelling one buff and decreasing Defense for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with the Portent of Destruction, decreasing their Combat Readiness by 25%. Increases Effectiveness of the caster for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with the Portent of Destruction, decreasing their Combat Readiness by 25%, and increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 25%. Increases Effectiveness of the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: A new friendship begins with a One! Two! Three! Ta-da!

story.en: At best, a free spirit, at worst, an irresponsible hedonist. Shooting Star Achates finds a life without stimulus meaningless, and is always on the lookout for trouble.

description.en: A whimsical and lovable wandering healer
Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.
Revives a dead ally with recovery magic. When the target is not dead, casts two random buffs for 3 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Revives a dead ally with recovery magic and grants immortality for 1 turn. When the target is not dead, grants immortality and two random buffs for 3 turns.

description.en: Dispels all debuffs from both the caster and target, and between the caster and the target, heals the ally with the lowest Health to the point that their Health matches the other, before healing further on top. Health matching effect is unaffected by healing buffs or debuffs. Additional healing increases proportional to the max Health of each ally.

get_line.en: I will do whatever I can to assist you in achieving your goals.

story.en: Head of the Homunculus Unit, Sigret is a close friend of Friedrich's. She holds complicated feelings towards Mercedes, who resembles her past self.

description.en: An envious Homunculus searching for redemption
Attacks with a scythe, with a {{variable}} chance each of inflicting two bleeding effects for 2 turns.

Batters the enemy with a scythe, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them unhealable and inflict bleeding for 2 turns. When the enemy's Health is 50% or less after the attack, activates Sever as an extra attack with a 100% chance of inflicting bleeding.

Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy, piercing their weak point. Penetrates Defense by 30%, with an additional 5% for each debuff inflicted on the enemy. Inflicts extinction when the enemy is defeated.

enhanced_description.en: Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy, piercing their weak point. Penetrates Defense by 30%, with an additional 10% for each debuff inflicted on the enemy. Inflicts extinction when the enemy is defeated.

get_line.en: I love running with the wind!

story.en: A young Elf born in Dun Blyraia, the Eternal Forest. At a young age Silk left the forest, meaning she knows little of her own race and her home. Her personality is bright and cheerful like a spring breeze.

description.en: A gentle Elf walking within the Eternal Wind
Shoots arrows at the enemy, decreasing their Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

Gains 1 Focus at the start of the turn, and consumes 1 Focus when attacked, increasing Combat Readiness by 15%. When the caster's stacked Focus is 2 or more, Single Shot is enhanced into Automatic Fire, increasing damage dealt.
Attacks all enemies with wind, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns, and granting increased Speed to the caster for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with wind, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns, and granting increased Speed to all allies for 2 turns.

get_line.en: I'm Aramintha, commander of the Silver Blade Company.

story.en: Commander of Savara's legendary Silver Blade Company. What began as a small group of people who had nowhere else to go gradually became greater in size thanks to Aramintha's charismatic leadership.

description.en: Red scorpion of Savara who cuts through the sandstorms.
Attacks the enemy with an explosion of flame, with a {{variable}} chance to burn for 1 turn.

soul_description.en: Effect Chance increases to 100%, ignores Effect Resistance.

description.en:
Activates Flame Release when the enemy is burned after using Flame Friction.
Flame Release: Attacks all enemies with mystic fire energy, with a 60% chance to burn for 1 turn, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 25%.
Drops a giant meteor to attack all enemies, making them unhealable for 2 turns, before a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Drops a giant meteor to attack all enemies, making them unhealable for 2 turns and stunning for 1 turn, before a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Well, I suppose I don't have much choice. But this doesn't mean we're friends, got it?

story.en: Daughter of a high-ranking noble, she was inflicted with an incurable disease and left in the care of the Church of the Goddess to receive treatment. However, as her condition only continued to worsen over time and her family eventually cut off support, she became little more than a burden. Cursing her own fate and the false hope the Church gave her, she traveled to a place named in a forbidden book and met with a mysterious being. She was then reborn anew, filled with hatred towards the world and the Church of the Goddess.

description.en: A cruel young girl who hates the world and the Church of the Goddess
Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn. When the caster is immortal, triggers a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

soul_description.en: Increases effect chance to 100% and decreases Attack of the target for 2 turns.

description.en: When the caster is immortal, enemies cannot be revived and all allies recover Health every time an enemy dies. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health. Recovery effect can only be activated once per turn.
Whips up a vortex of darkness and loathing, granting immortality to the caster for 2 turns. Grants increased Attack to all allies except for the caster for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Whips up a vortex of darkness and loathing, granting immortality to the caster for 2 turns. Grants increased Attack and Speed  to all allies except for the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: You'd better do your best if you wish to live.

story.en: A Gear-killer and bounty hunter who roams the world capturing wanted criminals. He boasts incredible fighting power, and while capable of harnessing all elements, he mainly sticks to Fire. He has a blunt and harsh way of speaking and prefers to use actions over words.

description.en:
The Flame of Corruption
who scorches all enemies

Attacks an enemy with pillars of fire. Damage dealt increases when the enemy isn't buffed. Activates Roman Cancel when the caster's **Fighting Spirit** is 100 after attacking. Cannot be triggered by a counterattack.
Roman Cancel: Consumes all **Fighting Spirit** and **extends the duration of buffs** granted to the caster by 1 turn, before granting the caster an **extra turn**.

When an enemy uses a non-attack skill, **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 20% and gains 20 **Fighting Spirit**. When suffering an attack that targets all allies, activates Volcanic Viper against the attacker. This effect is not activated by a counterattack, Dual Attack, or extra attack. Each effect can only be activated once every 2 turns.
Volcanic Viper (++Acquire 2 Soul++): Launches the enemy into the air and attacks repeatedly, inflicting --silence-- for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **enemy's max Health**.

Attacks with a strong punch, **dispelling all buffs**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **enemy's max Health**. After attacking, inflicts additional damage regardless of whether the attack hits.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with a strong punch, **dispelling all buffs** before making them --unable to be buffed-- for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **enemy's max Health**. After attacking, inflicts additional damage regardless of whether the attack hits.

get_line.en: Aw, have I been playing too hard to get? Maybe I should go outside... Huh?! Oh, w-what are you doing here?! Did you hear all that? H-Haha...

story.en: The owner of an ice castle in the Lone Tundra. Her daydreaming first began as a way to relieve her loneliness and boredom, but over time, it took on a life of its own, and now she lives entirely in a fantasy world of her own design.

description.en: An ice castle's owner who is waiting for her Prince Charming

Attacks the enemy with magic, with a 25% chance to stun for 1 turn. When used on the caster's turn, Pew, Pew, Pew! becomes an attack that targets all enemies. The changed attack does not trigger a Dual Attack.
Decreases the amount of Focus gained by the enemy by 100%. When the caster is buffed at the start of the turn, has a {{variable}} chance to grant daydream for 1 turn.
Decreases the enemy's buff durations by 1 turn before attacking with starlight, decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%. Grants stealth to the caster for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Decreases the enemy's buff durations by 1 turn before attacking with starlight, stunning for 1 turn before decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%. Grants stealth to the caster for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends the duration of buffs granted to the caster by Boom! Starlight Fall! by 1 turn and grants an extra turn.

get_line.en: My name? Should I give you my nickname, or my real name? Well, I guess it doesn't make a difference to you.

story.en: An Automatic Doll that hacks into the city's information network and steals intel. Sonia is so competitive that she always ends up spending the entire day playing even the simplest games made to foster friendship among hackers.

description.en: A genius hacker from the Unregulated Area whose playground is Politia's information network
Attacks the enemy with cover fire, before granting a barrier to the ally except for the caster with the lowest Health for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Recovers the target's Health using a recovery cube. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Recovers the target's Health using a recovery cube and dispels two debuffs. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Effect is granted to all allies.

description.en: Uses an enhanced recovery cube to grant all allies immunity for 2 turns, before recovering Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: I desire only one thing. Killing he who looks just like me.

story.en: Researchers who barely escaped with their lives from Sez's murderous rampage built a new living weapon modeled after him. This new weapon seeks to kill Sez to prove its superiority and worth.

description.en: A violent butcher who threatens Sez's life
Attacks with an iron mace, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn. When the target is stunned after the attack, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 25%.
Attacks all enemies with evil claws, with a 60% chance to stun for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies with evil claws, with a 60% chance to stun for 1 turn, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

description.en: Attacks with a light storm, inflicting extinction and resetting cooldown for this skill when the enemy is defeated. Penetrates Defense by 30%, or by 100% when the enemy is stunned. If this skill is available when an ally except for the caster is attacked, has a 20% chance to counterattack.

get_line.en: Now I shall force you into an eternal nightmare. Ahaha.

story.en: While searching for a form that she liked, Tenebria enjoyed destroying people's minds. Her greatest joy came from watching them die from the poison of her illusions.

description.en: A poisonous nightmare seeped in cruelty

Attacks with an explosion of poison energy, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict poison for 2 turns. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack. Attacks two enemies when Endless Nightmare is in cooldown.

When an ally capable of being attacked is still remaining, the caster cannot be selected as a target for attacks. Increases Attack and Defense of the caster by {{variable}} every time somebody dies. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.
Attacks with a nightmare crystal, stunning for 1 turn. Decreases the Combat Readiness of all remaining enemies by 50% when an enemy dies.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with a nightmare crystal, stunning for 1 turn. Decreases the Combat Readiness of all remaining enemies by 50% when an enemy dies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.

get_line.en: Nice to meet you, call me Surin.

story.en: Coming from the East with her sentient weapon Mann, Surin vaguely remembers the journey that brought her to Ritania, but nothing else. Following Mann's voice, she embarks on a journey to find her lost memories.

description.en: A calm and composed warrior from the East
Attacks with a chain axe. When the enemy is bleeding, causes two bleeding effects for 2 turns.
Batters the enemy with a chain axe and inflicts two bleeding effects for 2 turns, decreasing Attack for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Batters the enemy with a chain axe and inflicts two to four bleeding effects for 2 turns, decreasing Attack for 1 turn.

description.en: Triggers all the bleeding effects currently inflicted on the enemy. Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of bleeding effects inflicted on the enemy, and debuff duration is extended by 1 turn. Additionally, the caster's Combat Readiness increases by 15% per every bleeding effect inflicted on the enemy. Effect can only be applied up to 5 times.

get_line.en: Look forward to what I have to offer!

story.en: The leader of Wetheric Moor's new Strongman Company, Sven is straightforward and outgoing, with a goal to keep getting stronger. A hot-blooded young man who is likely training even now.

description.en: A native of Wetheric Moor, and leader of a new mercenary company

Attacks with dual-wielded swords, and when the caster's Health is 50% or less, activates Repelling Blow as an extra attack. Repelling Blow can only be activated once per turn of the caster.
Repelling Blow (Acquire 1 Soul): Attacks the enemy repeatedly with dual-wielded swords. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

Grants immortality for 1 turn and increased Attack for 2 turns when the caster receives lethal damage.
Can only be activated once every {{variable}} turn(s).
Attacks all enemies and inflicts huge damage, using 15% of Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks all enemies and inflicts huge damage. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

get_line.en: Twinkle twinkle! I'll be your star in the darkness!

story.en: An idol that brings joy and cheer through her electrifying music. She has great magical talent and can harness magic with her voice. She changes her appearance on stage with the Blooming Pendant and becomes more dynamic and lively.

description.en: Appearing with a flash and the sound of singing!

(Tamarinne) Attacks an enemy with a serene melody and heals the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the ally's max Health. Decreases cooldown of Shining Star☆ by 1 turn.
(Idol) Attacks all enemies with a beautiful voice, dispelling all buffs. Triggers a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

soul_description.en: Greatly recovers Health of all allies after attacking.

description.en:
(Tamarinne) Heals all allies with a peaceful melody. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Decreases cooldown of Shining Star☆ by 1 turn.
(Idol) With a powerful performance, increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns and increases Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, recovering Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

Before performing, dispels all debuffs inflicted on all allies and recovers the caster to max Health. The caster becomes an idol for 3 turns and performs a concert. Begins the first battle with full cooldown count.

enhanced_description.en: Before performing, dispels all debuffs inflicted on all allies and recovers the caster to max Health and grants an extra turn. The caster becomes an idol for 3 turns and performs a concert. Begins the first battle with full cooldown count.

get_line.en: Salute! I vow to follow your every order!

story.en: A member of the Taranor Guard. Unafraid of death, they will obey any order.

description.en: A brave guard protecting Taranor
Knocks the enemy into the air with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 1 turn.
Increases chance of Dual Attack by {{variable}}. Combat Readiness of all allies increases by 25% when a Dual Attack is triggered.

enhanced_description.en: Increases chance of Dual Attack by {{variable}}. Combat Readiness of all allies increases by 25% and the caster is granted increased Attack for 1 turn when a Dual Attack is triggered.

description.en: Pierces the enemy's weak point with a spear, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: Leave everything to me.

story.en: Soldiers responsible for guarding the King and Taranor Royal Palace, even as the energy of rebellion flows throughout Taranor, they remain faithfully loyal.

description.en: For Taranor! A soldier following any royal command
Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
The caster reflects {{variable}} of the damage suffered from a critical hit. Reflected damage can't be higher than caster's max Health.
Jumps towards the enemy and attacks them, dispelling all buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Jumps towards the enemy and attacks them, dispelling all buffs and absorbing all damage as Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: What’s your request?

story.en: A girl from a far eastern empire. As a warrior and daughter of a decorated general, she fought in several wars. However, as the empire fell, she was forced to flee to Ritania. With the help of a knight from Taranor she was able to adapt to this new life and now strives to pay back that favor.

description.en: A determined young girl who has lost her country
Dives at the enemy with a chain axe, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two bleeding effects for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Dives at the enemy with a chain axe, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two bleeding effects for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the caster's lost Health.

description.en: Damage suffered in one attack does not exceed 51% of max Health. When the caster's Health is 70% or less when an enemy's turn ends, dispels all debuffs from the caster and grants stealth for 1 turn, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}}. Can only be activated once per turn.

Attacks all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns and inflict silence for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the caster's lost Health.

get_line.en: What you wish to see. What you wish not to see. I will show you everything.

story.en: An Acolyte who freely deals out all kinds of illusions, Tenebria is known as the Phantom Queen. She bewilders her targets by overwhelming them with terrifying illusions or by taking on the appearance of others. Though she may look playful, she is monstrously cruel.

description.en: The Phantom Queen who deals in cruel illusions
Attacks with an explosion of dark energy, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn. This skill does not trigger a Dual Attack.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks with an explosion of dark energy, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn. When an enemy is put to sleep, the caster's Combat Readiness increases by 50%. This skill does not trigger a Dual Attack.

description.en: Summons ominous thunder to attack all enemies, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}} and decreasing Speed for 2 turns.
Drops Moon of Nightmare on all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Defense for 2 turns and put them to sleep for 1 turn, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: I look forward to working with you.

story.en: An adventurous woman, Tieria always chooses to travel in dangerous locations to satisfy her love for thrills. Her personality is calm and carefree, and she prefers to travel alone instead of dealing with other people. However, her beauty ensures she always attracts plenty of attention.

description.en: An adventurer of strange new lands who loves solitude
Attacks with an axe, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.
A successful attack increases the Combat Readiness of all allies except for the caster by {{variable}}.
Strikes the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the target's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Strikes the enemy strongly, dealing damage proportional to the target's max Health.

get_line.en: Oh my gosh, did you want my auto— Wait, there's something on my clothes? Noooo! I just bought these!

story.en: After taking the wandering designer Lilibet's advice, she became a model and now fights wearing a specialized suit. Her goal is to defeat Straze, a corrupt designer who took control of Fastus, a tailor's knife that can even slice the universe, and his model, Roana.

description.en: A carefree model fighting for her friends and the universe

Uses the suit's energy to attack the enemy. When used on the caster's turn, has a 40% chance to grant an extra attack with the same skill. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, damage sharing effects are ignored.
Manifests the suit's energy, increasing Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}}. Grants the caster an extra turn.

enhanced_description.en: Manifests the suit's energy, increasing Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}} and increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn.

description.en: Transcends cosmic space to attack the enemy with dimensional energy, before granting the caster stealth for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, inflicts extinction and decreases the caster's skill cooldown by 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

get_line.en: Pleased to meet you. I will go wherever I’m needed.

story.en: Crozet's Moonlight Shade who does as he pleases with no consideration for anyone around him. As a result, he has started causing a lot of trouble, leading the original Crozet to come looking for him.

description.en: A reckless knight surrounded by rumors and scandals

Attacks the enemy in an act of faith, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn. When it is not the caster's turn, effect chance increases by 20%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Swears an oath of protection, dispelling all debuffs from the caster and one ally, before increasing Defense for 3 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Swears an oath of protection, dispelling all debuffs from the caster and one ally, before increasing Defense for 3 turns. Grants class enhancement to the ally for 3 turns.

get_line.en: I will follow you with all of my heart.

story.en: Captain of the Royal Guard of Lefundos, a kingdom situated in Eureka, Tywin holds the favor of his king Schniel. A hard worker, he values rule and order over all else, and gives off the impression that he will not listen to what you have to say.

description.en: Captain of the Lefundos Royal Guard, a model of faithful diligence
Attacks with a swordstorm, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Grants increased Attack and Critical Hit Chance to the caster and an ally for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Grants increased Attack and Critical Hit Chance to the caster and an ally for 2 turns, and increases Combat Readiness by 30%.

description.en: Attacks all enemies again after a swordstorm, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and increases Defense of the caster for 3 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Nice idea! I won't let you down.

story.en: Due to his humorous style of speaking, many mistake Vildred as being light-hearted, but he has a serious side that leads him to stubbornly push ahead with what he thinks is right.

description.en: A paragon of righteousness and principle, a reliable companion of Ras's
Rapidly attacks two enemies with a swordstorm. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns and activates Dancing Blade when an enemy is defeated by Sweep or Blade Ascent.
Dancing Blade (Acquire 1 Soul): Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm.

enhanced_description.en:
Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns and activates Dancing Blade when an enemy is defeated by Sweep or Blade Ascent. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 20% when an enemy is defeated.
Dancing Blade (Acquire 1 Soul): Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, dealing damage proportional to the caster's Speed.

get_line.en: Haha, finally, my time has come!

story.en: A swordsman of the Perland Raiders, born into a noble Perland family. Though Violet may appear elegant, he behaves anything but. While incredibly skilled, he has few friends due to his excessive narcissism.

description.en: A shameless narcissist with a free spirit
Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn.

soul_description.en: Increases effect chance to 100% and decreases Attack of the target for 2 turns.

description.en: Prepares for a duel by dispelling two debuffs from the caster and recovering Health by 15%, before granting an extra turn. When this skill is on cooldown, increases Evasion by 35% and counterattacks with Graceful Cut following a successful evasion, before gaining 1 Focus.
Pierces the enemy with a sword, and consumes all Focus. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of Focus consumed.

enhanced_description.en: Pierces the enemy with a sword, and consumes all Focus. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of Focus consumed. When 5 Focus is consumed, resets cooldown of Butterfly Cut.

get_line.en: May my magical power save you.

story.en: Granddaughter of a reclusive magical scholar, Vivian is gifted with incredible magical ability. As leader of Witchaven, she maintains a delicate balance between bickering factions of sorcerers, but the growing numbers of Unknown and machinations of political enemies have her treading on thin ice.

description.en: Magical scholar and citylord of Witchaven, the City of Sorcerers
Smashes the enemy with a rock, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.

enhanced_description.en: Smashes the enemy with a rock, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. A critical hit will increase the caster's Combat Readiness by an additional 10%.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with a thunderstorm. Activates Thunder God's Cry again when an enemy is defeated. Each subsequent Thunder God's Cry activated this way deals decreased damage, and can be activated up to 3 times.

Fully amplifies mana, granting immunity to all allies for 3 turns before granting increased Attack (Greater) to the caster for 3 turns while increasing Attack of all allies except for the caster for 3 turns.

get_line.en: I'll quit as soon as it gets boring, but until then, let's have fun together.

story.en: A girl from Reingar, Wanda is a curious young woman who gets bored of things very easily. Former student, nun, and mercenary, she is currently working as a self-styled treasure hunter... for now.

description.en: A temperamental young woman who hates to be bored
Shoots an arrow at the enemy. When the enemy is targeted, damage dealt is increased and their Combat Readiness is decreased by {{variable}}.
Has a {{variable}} chance to target a random enemy for 2 turns at the beginning of each turn.
Attacks the enemy's vital points, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy's vital points, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Did you miss me? Tell me the truth!

story.en: An Elf born on the outskirts of Dun Blyraia, the Eternal Forest. Raised by the World Tree that pitied her, Silk is fiercely proud, but forever yearning for her people.

description.en: A fiercely proud Elf left alone in the Eternal Forest
Shoots arrows at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to cause bleeding for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

Fires a volley of arrows at the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by 10%. Has a 50% chance of granting an extra attack with the same skill, increasing effect chance by an additional 50% when the target is debuffed. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Shoots an arrow infused with the power of lightning, inflicting silence for 2 turns and decreasing Combat Readiness by 100%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

enhanced_description.en: Shoots an arrow infused with the power of lightning, inflicting silence and making them unhealable for 2 turns, and decreasing Combat Readiness by 100%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

get_line.en: Let's do our best together.

story.en: A member of the Sicar assassin organization, Watcher Schuri is an outstanding fighter, but ignorant of the ways of the world. Though his rigid way of speaking gives off an air of unapproachability, he is surprisingly straightforward and open to granting people's requests. However, he hides a secret he cannot share with others.

description.en: A secretive Sicar assassin
Shoots the enemy with a rifle, with a {{variable}} chance to target them for 2 turns.
Shoots all enemies with a rifle, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff, and increases Speed of the caster for 2 turns.
Shoots a magic bullet at the enemy, penetrating their Defense by 80%.

enhanced_description.en: Shoots a magic bullet at the enemy, penetrating their Defense.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: Oh, you need my help? Cool, let's go!

story.en: Originally a Dragon of Wintenberg, through certain events Yufine eventually found her way to Ritania. Cheerful and curious, her excessive curiosity often leads to accidents. She loves shiny things so much that she tends to zone out while staring at them.

description.en: A lively Dragon girl who loves shiny things
Attacks by swinging their weapon, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Attacks with a dragon howl, dispelling one buff from all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to silence for 1 turn, before granting increased Attack and Speed to the caster for 2 turns.
Hits the enemy with a finishing blow, dispelling all buffs and stunning for 1 turn.

enhanced_description.en: Hits the enemy with a finishing blow, dispelling all buffs and stunning for 1 turn. Damage dealt is increased by 50% when the enemy is buffed.

get_line.en: Hooray! Yuna is coming!

story.en: President of the Reingar Student Council and the chosen Heir by the Guardian, Kazran. Yuna is a high school girl who was summoned into this world. She is full of curiosity and obsessed with technology, constantly running experiments.

description.en: President of the Reingar Student Council, the school girl from another world

Attacks all enemies with a drone before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 6% per target and all other allies by 2% per target. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies.
Buffs all allies with a drone and increases Attack for 2 turns.

enhanced_description.en: Buffs all allies with a drone and increases Attack and Speed for 2 turns.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with a cannon. A successful attack always results in a critical hit. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies. Grants an extra turn to the caster.

get_line.en: Join the Chaos Sect and you can become just as strong as me.

story.en: A Banshee who holds a grudge against the Church of the Goddess for rejecting her wishes. After finding out they share an enemy and a grudge, she joined the Chaos Sect and is now working with them to spread the word of Chaos. However, her personality is a poor match for the job, and now she is pondering how to fulfill her duties.

description.en: A zealot fully immersed in an enraged belief
Claws the enemy, before absorbing some of the damage as Health.
Attacks the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}} before decreasing Speed of the enemy for 2 turns and increasing Speed of the caster for 2 turns.

description.en: Attacks the enemy, dispelling all buffs and making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns, before increasing Attack and Defense of the caster for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: My name is Zeno. My destiny is to rule the universe.

story.en: An emperor from another galaxy who was defeated in a tournament held by Notos. He obsessed over power and life, eventually binding his soul with that of a star and becoming transcendent. He now heads toward Orbis in search of the Monolith.

description.en: A fanatical mage corrupted by endless desire
Attacks with thorns, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
When the enemy uses a non-attack skill, increases Defense of the caster and damage dealt by Ancient Beast by {{variable}}, and increases Effectiveness by 5%. Can stack up to 8 times.
Summons an ancient beast to attack all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to silence for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhanced_description.en: Summons an ancient beast to attack all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to silence for 1 turn, and inflicts bleeding for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Will I finally meet someone who can take me on?

story.en: The frost mage of Reingar, Zerato is the second son of a Spirit Weaver clan, blessed by Nixied, the Lord of Winter. He's a genius who hates to feel hot, and loves showing off. Like most Reingar students he pays no attention to those things he deems unimportant, and often crosses the line in his study of magic.

description.en: A genius frost mage who will freeze everything
Attacks an enemy with an ice pick, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.
Attacks the enemy repeatedly, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

enhanced_description.en: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Damage dealt is increased when the enemy is debuffed.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with a giant iceberg, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.
